Has literally been useless I got a VENMO card and have yet to be able to use it‚Ä¶ I have money in my account and my Venmo card will not work anywhere when I called them they say there is a security hold on my account and they can‚Äôt forsee nor change when the security hold will end‚Ä¶ The whole point of this app is simplicity and if it actually works it would be wonderful‚Ä¶ But it has been nothing but a headache and I still can‚Äôt access my money. looks like I will have to transfer it to somebody who doesn‚Äôt have an unexplained security hold and find a different way to send the money. Venmo Review I've been extremely satisfied with Venmo!

Very User-Friendly! I downloaded Venmo during a tough period in my life when some friends wanted to donate money to help. Not Secure This app is UNSAFE. I use Venmo all the time. It‚Äôs an easy way to pay people and receive money. HOWEVER, Venmo is not a secure bank. It‚Äôs an app that functions like a bank without any of the high security of a bank. The fact that they don‚Äôt REQUIRE every user to have a password to enter the app is unbelievable. They should insist on multi-step authentication.  I‚Äôve been hacked and had $2000+ stolen in a matter of seconds. All because Venmo doesn‚Äôt require stiffer authentication to enter the app and to authorize additional/new users. They also don‚Äôt have 24/7 help like a bank in case of fraud. If someone hacks you at 10am on Saturday, you‚Äôre going to have to wait until Monday to talk to a human.

This could be perfect... but apparently modernity has failed us Truthfully, the app works wonders. It make transferring money very easy and convenient and the fact that you can link your bank account is just the cherry on the icing.

Convenient and no issues Recently started commuting downtown and needed a couple 10-ride passes for a partial month. Early mornings are hard enough and knew I'd miss the train buying at the station. Certainly a recommend for anyone who likes an easy way to buy, store, and use tickets.

Takes DAYS to transfer This app is very behind. There are so many apps that allow you to transfer to your bank account immediately. This app still takes  DAYS to make the funds available in your bank account. It‚Äôs unfortunate because I do like the app itself but when there are other options that don‚Äôt require you to wait 1-4 business days to access your own money, it defeats the purpose. And for those that say that it is the banks fault, Google wallet transfers directly to your bank in a matter of seconds. So it is definitely possible.. I don‚Äôt recommend Venmo, especially if it‚Äôs an emergency.

Horrible Customer Service I have used Venmo for a while now and things have been fine. However, when I had trouble and needed help, the customer service was horrible. I opted for the chat option and Kierra W provided no help. I had to ask my question 3 times and still did not get anymore help than I could have found on the FAQ page. At the end, I finally asked to just speak with her supervisor and she would not provide the information. I had to ask 3 times for a supervisor and I was finally given the customer service phone number. If you use Venmo, just hope you never need assistance from them.

Love this app I love Venmo and don‚Äôt have anything bad to say about the app. However, I implore your marketing team to please find a way to target older people and also utility companies. FAILED I needed to send my brother in TX money for him and his kids. His bank does not support Venmo so he transferred the money back to me so that I could instantly download my money.  When I tried it said sorry unable to transfer. Told me I had to do the three day. HORRIBLE !!‚Äô I‚Äôve been trying to use my account and it doesn‚Äôt let me send or receive money. I had disputed a charge early in the year due to it being fraudulent. Horrible experience Since establishing my account with venmo, I maybe made 1 or 2 transactions with my immediate friends and then never used the service again. Even after removing my card and any type of payment method from my account I'm still getting incremental charges. Fraud DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!!!
Worst app I‚Äôve ever used. Wish I could give 0 stars Actually, I wish there was an alternative scale of ‚Äúthumbs down‚Äù so that I could give 5 of them.

Supporting Criminals and Criminal Activity Allowing fraudulent actions to continue by a user! Fast. Easy. Not bad Im surprised at how easy it is so just send someone money, say if you forgot your wallet. Fast simple and keep a log of what you paid. Terrible customer service I have been a Venmo member for the past year with no complaints until last week. On Thursday I reported an unauthorized payment of $180 which somehow originated from my account to a payee not in my contacts. I immediately changed my password and PIN as my account had been compromised. Venmo froze my account, then asked for a photo of my drivers license in an email. I did so and today, 3 days after the fraudulent payment, Venmo permanently cancelled my account for violation of terms. When I called customer service, they claimed that their policy did not allow them to handle disputes by phone. Unbelievable. Not only will I never see my $180 again, but I guess I somehow violated my contract without even doing anything! It‚Äôs just as well that my account is cancelled as I would have cancelled it myself. Venmo at your own risk! I regret that I did.

Square Cash is better but Venmo works fine Venmo is an okay payment app but I like Squarecash much better, Venmo is more well known and more of my friends use it so that is why I use it but I prefer Squarecash because if you choose the free option Venmo takes much longer. Also, I love how SquareCash gives you a real debit card for free if you request one or you can just use their virtual debit card # to spend the money instantly anywhere. If Venmo could make their free withdrawals transfer by the next day regardless of the day of the week and had the same free features of SquareCash then I would choose to use it instead of only using it for friends without Squarecash.

Horrible experience : Rip off company Tried to send $650 to a family member, they wouldn‚Äôt allow her to deposit it to her bank so she sent it back to me. Love This App! The Venmo app has been such a huge help with being able to quickly receive $ & also paying back $ owed. I‚Äôve been using Venmo for around 2 years and never had 1 issue with it. Where is the PayPal integration? It is ridiculous that PayPal 1) has two separate payment apps that do the same thing, and 2) that PayPal did not think to at least integrate the two platforms.  I have had PayPal for well over 10 years, and I simply did not need another payment app.  PayPal worked perfectly fine.  If you wanted to add all these pointless features, you should‚Äôve just added it to the PayPal app and platform.  At a minimum, you should‚Äôve integrated the two separate platforms so that PayPal users can pay Venmo users without having to download another app from the same company that does the same thing.  It‚Äôs not rocket science, why did you have to complicate things when nobody was asking for a separate app?  To make matters worse, you‚Äôre still not turning a profit on Venmo.  This app would get 0 stars from me if it were allowed.
9 things I love about venMo This app has never disappointed me!

Absolutely horrible customer service I used Venmo a lot going back and forth on bills with roommates, and they recently lost my business. Money stolen without notification or refund Three days ago over $1000 was stolen from my account. Complete Joke - takes money from minors. So I sent my little sister (who is in college as well as working) $20 so she can eat something, it just so happens her account was hacked. Venmosteals your money Like a couple of other stories I‚Äôve read, on my first transaction via Venmo, I acted as bank for my son‚Äôs girlfriend for their rent. Poor Customer Service I was happy with this app, until it started declining my bank transfers for no reason - although I never had any issues with funds in my bank.

Failed to reverse fraudulent charges I recently have had my phone hacked as described by my county sheriff and there were deposits made to my bank account that were fraudulent via mobile pay with forged checks! The worst way to send/receive money! I so am deleting this app.  I‚Äôve had nothing but issues with them from the start. What a crappy way to take a great idea and turn it into mush I‚Äôve used PayPal, Square, and other transaction apps, and this is the least user friendly of them all. Declined, declined, declined I have 2 bank accounts and ONE debit card. Venmo declined a transaction for ‚Äúsecurity‚Äù reasons. Asked me to add a new bank account or debit card! Terrible service by Joe So I called venmo customer service and talked to them about the problem I was having. Unfortunately Venmo was charging my card twice. Venmo card Called customer service because my card was being declined at an atm because apparently the ATM wasn‚Äôt working. No money came out of my account nor did I use my card.

Thieves If I could give zero stars, I would. The app itself is a good idea. The customer service is TERRIBLE. DO NOT USE THIS APP THIS APP STEALS YOUR INFO AND MONEY. I used this app with trust because I have been using PayPal for years. PLEASE READ!!! Denied my fraud claim so I lost $2000 I‚Äôm not one to review things but I have to now.  Someone hacked my account and sent $2000 to someone I don‚Äôt know out of my checking account.

Holding my money The app showed I was paid but will not allow me to select the bank accounts I‚Äôve been using for over a year.   Instead it brings me to adding accounts and a card. Thanks for being a handy friend I‚Äôve always wanted a friend who can do instant quick painless jobs like paying people when I borrowed money...and for years I used a dear friend THE CHECK and his cronies the MAIL ... and things got a little dicey ...checks would go missing, sometimes even lost for years and then they would suspiciously turn up returned in my mailbox with a tire mark as if returned from a funky expedition... but ever since Venmo came on the scene my life has been pretty much on point... the greatest thing ... Concerning lack of Customer awareness and service I have the Venmo debit card. Venmo uses my bank account to reimburse themselves for my purchases. That‚Äôs fine. Horrible Read fine print carefully. Without notification, Venmo will complete a transaction for you and cover the payment if your funds are unavailable from your bank. This will cause you to then have to go to your bank and ask them to either refund your money or place a stop payment on your bank so your funds can make it to the payee. Venmo will freeze your account and suspend it until you pay back the indebted amount otherwise you‚Äôre stuck in a situation where you‚Äôve paid for a stop payment to occur, you‚Äôre trying to recover your money from insufficient funds from your bank, as well as trying to get a refund back from the payee.

Life saver What did we ever do before venmo came along? We just didn't get paid! If they did what they say it would be great My boys and I are always borrowing or paying for each other. Dealt with fraud I had a situation with fraudulent transactions being made recently, involving several transactions totaling $2600. I urge you guys to be wary of this app and identity theft, there are plenty of better money transfer apps out there, like Zelle.

Do Not Use!! I have had an account with Venmo for a long time with no issues. However last week someone stole my purse and cellphone! I call to disable my card which they do. VENMO customer service is trash I sent money to my friend and realized that he actually owed me money so he sent it right back. Venmo said they were reviewing the transaction so needed 48 hrs. Double transaction I‚Äôve been a fan of Venmo up until this recent experience. My first attempt sending out a payment failed due to an error, so I made a second attempt and successfully transmitted. Beware!  Stay away! Created an account a while back to send some money to my sister. TURN AWAY! Poor Security And even worse Customer Service Within 2 months of using Venmo my account was hacked into even with Venmo‚Äôs security system which sends you a text with a 6 digit pin that you have to enter. All transactions are PUBLIC by Default.... Word to the Wise:  All transactions are labeled as ‚ÄúPublic‚Äù by Default. So, to all the old dinosaurs out there who don‚Äôt like to crow about their financial transactions, change the settings if you download this app and sign up for Venmo.  I would give this app 5 stars for convenience and ingenuity‚Äîit‚Äôs a great idea.  But the company setting the Default to ‚ÄúPublic‚Äù is not cool, not at all. Why not issue the app setting as ‚ÄúPrivate‚Äù and then let kids change it to ‚ÄúPublic‚Äù if they want?  One star and shame on Venmo. But I‚Äôm an old dinosaur, so who cares what I think anyway?

Money froze I am a car detailer and I accept Venmo as payments from clients because most of the time they don‚Äôt have cash on them. Zero Reliability Venmo is cool until they decide you can no longer have your money. Terrible Venmo was supposed to be ‚Äúeasy & reliable‚Äù although that is not the case! If I‚Äôd known it was so painless I‚Äôd have done it long ago ! Incredible.  No drive to ATM no charges for outside bank no writing a check.  No gas to ATM no tolls now worries. Perfect Simple UI. Clean Layout.  Though, the best part is the app does exactly what it claims to do. This brings the simplicity to day-to-day finance without the headache. Don‚Äôt use this card! Super easy and quick Once you get the hang of it, you can send money in literally 20 seconds. Why does Venmo keep a record of account information after the account has been closed and deleted? I want my account to be closed and my card number to be completely cut off from Venmo's systems. Took my money My cousin and I were using it to send each other money for rent. He‚Äôs in the military, so we needed an easier way to transfer money fast, since mailing a check takes time. His money is nowhere to be found and when I called them again, I was told to wait for an email from an account specialist, which I haven‚Äôt gotten. This is exactly what we were trying to avoid.

First time to set up and account was frozen I had too pay a friend some money and she is using Venmo. I won‚Äôt be seeing her in a while and she is traveling so Venmo seemed to be most convenient. An unnecessary hassle with something that‚Äôs supposed to make it easy I already was tired of the fact that you literally HAVE to put in a reason for the transaction. Worst worst app ever! Stay away! I am really disappointed in Venmo. Mobile payment was such a great idea. After using WeChat pay and Alipay for years, I was so excited to see Venmo coming out. Oh Venmo, we love you Who knows what we did before this app. Honestly Venmo successfully grows a sense of community. Stick with cash app Transferred $6 to pay a friend for a product, thinking it would transfer automatically/immediately, it did not. It said would take 3-7 business days. What is the point of that?? Leary at First, But Now Not so Much I have a granddaughter in college and sending her monthly / bi-monthly checks or money orders could be a bit of hassle if I had to leave house & for her finding some place to cash those checks or money orders w/0 crazy cashing fees.

Easy to use!! Seriously, this app is one of my top favorite apps. It‚Äôs made sending/ receiving money so easy and hassle free. First, I‚Äôd like to add what really stood out to me using this app, was the customer care. The few times I‚Äôve ran into issues, their customer service has exceeded my expectations every single time. Secondly, the apps security and privacy policy is perfect. Never have I ran into any issues with fraudulent or suspicious activity. If I have, they were quick to help me close my account and create a new one, hassle free. Great Job Venmo!

Convenience offset by social aspect I thoroughly enjoy the service provided and its ease of use. It's also quite popular and common among those I know, particularly in big cities like NYC, making it even easier to frequently use it. But unlike Square Cash, it needlessly combines a social aspect that informs others of financial transactions, from menial payments of going out to eat to far more substantial and personal items like rent. I've turned this feature off, keeping all transactions private, but most everyone else I know pops up on the financial feed with all their transactions out in the open, rather than kept private and secure.

Not worth the trouble better off using Zelle I signed up for Venmo because a client of mine uses it to send funds from time to time. After setting up my account everything seemed to be working fine. However I was then sent an email saying that my account was frozen and if I didn‚Äôt provide them with an excessive amount of background information that my account it would stay frozen. After already sending this app my banking info, name, address I didn‚Äôt see the need for them to then have utility bills, copies of my sensitive documents and any of the other items that they asked for. With identity theft being so rampant today I would rather use Zelle that is already linked to major banks and does not demand my sensitive information.

You asked for a rating 3/5 because the transactions don‚Äôt go through to the bank account fast enough, and I haven‚Äôt found an easy way to send a specific amount out of my Venmo balance and the rest out of my bank account. For example, if I want to send $100, and I have $50 in my Venmo balance, I have to do two transactions. First transaction $50 from Venmo, second transaction $50 from my bank account. Instead of pressing send $100 and it pulls from my Venmo balance first and the rest from my bank account easily. The app is appreciated, just wanted to let you know how it would be easier for myself personally.

No help with failed transactions??!! I added a new bank debit card and am no longer able to do instant transfers.  To have customer service closed by 5 with ZERO guidance or exploration on the app about the specific error notification is ridiculous.  Being that Venmo is a financial services business, ensuring that customers have 100% access and transparency to THEIR funds should be job one.

Not enough security I‚Äôm quitting Venmo before it is too late. My research:  Venmo is not secure.  It does not allow the user to set appropriate limits on transactions. It is easy for hackers scammers and thieves to get your money and Venmo will not prevent, protect, recover, or make you whole if you are victim of theft or fraud. Did you know that Venmo will advance thousands of dollars for you (or a thief) regardless of how much money is in your bank account?  Venmo does not have a sure way of tracking and recovering stolen money from users. YOU are then required to pay Venmo the entire amount. You could be wiped out. Yes it‚Äôs free product, but it still holds that if you are not paying for the product, you ARE the product. Users beware. This service is not being operated with your best interest in mind.

Venmo app Easy to setup and i get the wait on your bank but with all the breaches that dont get disclosed why allow access to any bank so I would use the venmo card option to get money out and load your acct and remove your info. Extremely convenient Most of the time money exchanges hands from the people on your contact list anyway so they are there automatically. Nothing but issues Since downloading and attempting to use have had them not able to verify my bank account, their system having issues so instant transfer was in available until after the verification of my bank account failed (over a week) then told after the second transaction used for that my routing number must not have been correct to delete and re-enter my same bank info. There is no way to deny a deposit There is no way to deny a deposit. Account locked with no warning I‚Äôve tried contacting them several times and the only thing they can tell me is to use another account. Not possible!! Annoying app to use I recently downloaded this app for which I need and I have only been able to send one transaction through. Very slow on transferring money They tend to hold your money up for days they also denie instant transfers when ever they want it‚Äôs crazy I‚Äôm not a very big fan of them I think after my transfer goes thru and I can finally pay my rent I‚Äôm gonna close my Venmo account there no good I will start using Apple Cash /pay way faster and better they don‚Äôt screw you around as I got a 1000 dollar instant transfer in minute go apple your my new best friend I‚Äôm saying goodbye to Venmo  don‚Äôt even bother trying Venmo you will lose your money at any given point and the customer service lady briana h she was rude as heck when I asked the status of my bank transfer she says it‚Äôs being reviewed it will get there when it gets there so I give Venmo no stars there no good

You can‚Äôt track transactions I transferred $300 to my son. He tried to link his bank account to the app because it wouldn‚Äôt allow him to transfer the money to his debit card. PLZ READ THIS REVIEW So let me start by saying, I don‚Äôt EVER leave reviews but this can not go unsaid.

Don‚Äôt download This app seemed really nice at first. Very unintuitive; written by people who obviously don‚Äôt use it. Annoying graphics In the ‚Äònote‚Äô section I entered ‚ÄòBrewers tickets‚Äô and as soon as I did that a bunch of annoying graphics showed up and the ‚ÄòPay‚Äô button disappeared. Update the App I am frustrated in how I almost got cheated out of my money. This app is a good app when it comes to notifying someone when they have been charged a payment. Frozen account My account was frozen so I called customer service to see why and they told me that I would have to speak to an account specialist to reopen my account. Fair enough. Simple fixes Nice, but could add a couple quick fixes - one would be to allow the option to tap on people in your list of previously sent payments and allow the sending of money...or to at least include there ID so you can click and send another payment. Zero stars is really what it should be I don‚Äôt typically use things like Venmo and PayPal because I don‚Äôt trust them. Once revolutionary, now mediocre I‚Äôve been using Venmo since it launched, and for a while it was unrivaled. Now many other competitors beat them at their own game. I spent the time to write this review so I must love it I use Venmo all the time with my friends! HORRIBLE !! Instant transfer option is BS !!! If you‚Äôre looking for an app that will transfer your funds to your bank account instantly  this IS NOT IT !!! WORST COMPANY EVER!!! Absolute WORST service I‚Äôve ever used. You contact customer service, they tell you that you have to wait on an email response from an account specialist. Remove ‚ÄúPay by phone number‚Äù option if it doesn‚Äôt work I paid using ‚Äúpay by phone number‚Äù option ad my payment was placed on hold, marked as unclaimed in notifications. Needless to say it was immediately taken out of my bank account.

Don‚Äôt use!!!!! DO YOUR RESEARCH!!!!! Only use if you don‚Äôt want payment protection! I blindly agreed to use this vs P.P. Keeps your money! This app is crap. I never have used it before, but was needing something to transfer funds with a friend of mine from another state, who did it have ZELLE. To make it easier I said I would get Venmo. Well the money is now sitting there and I can‚Äôt get it.

Love the app but... I love the app and it‚Äôs easy to use and fast. I HATE when I need to send people money it uses my Venmo balance and i don‚Äôt even have the option to use my card/bank account. Fraud While the app itself comes in very handy, it is quite easy for someone to steal or transfer your funds and there is no way for Venmo to trace it or get your money back! Here‚Äôs what happened to me - phone was stolen and I hadn‚Äôt logged out of the Venmo app. Phone thief simply added a card to my account and did an instant transfer. Here‚Äôs the interesting part. Because the money was in the app my bank isn‚Äôt responsible. Because I don‚Äôt have an account from the card phone thief added and it wasn‚Äôt my account that bank can‚Äôt trace it or release any info. Venmo couldn‚Äôt give me a good enough reason that they can‚Äôt simply refund my money. So I‚Äôm out $510, frustrating situation.

Issues So many issues. The app directs you to contact your bank if a transaction is declined. When I finally received a response, it was that Venmo had flagged my debit card for security reasons and there was nothing that could be done. Really? Anyway, would not recommend this service to anyone.

Well, I mean sure It transfers money and all. But what they are not clear about is that they DO NOT process refunds or rescind payments. They make it your responsibility to deal with the payee directly. They DO NOT take Venmo money out first. If, for example you make a payment of $500 but only have $300 in Venmo, what they do is take the ENTIRE $500 out of your bank and bypass funds in Venmo. So if you don‚Äôt have the entire $500 in your bank account -BAM $27 NSF charges. And they‚Äôll keep trying to take $$ from your bank acct. Best Practice is to keep $0 in Venmo and have it all drawn from your bank acct.

Financial nightmare Someone from another state managed to hack into my account and steal $600 from me. Venmo approved this transaction and allowed it to happen. After multiple unreturned emails, I called and was put on hold for at least 30 minutes. I disputed the claim and was denied by Venmo. They wrote an email saying that after "careful investigation, the transaction was not unauthorized or erroneous." I notified my bank and filed a fraudulent claim with them. *Public* is the default setting Really? The default privacy setting is ‚Äúto the public‚Äù? Talk about oversharing, Jesus. This is getting nuts. I don‚Äôt give a crap who is paying who, and what it is for, and you shouldn‚Äôt either. So weird.

as long as the credit card thing doesn‚Äôt change This is the most convenient, life-saving app I‚Äôve ever used as far as transferring money. The option to use credit cards as well is amazing. Fxxx this app I had my account frozen for no reason, they had told me they weren‚Äôt allowed to say why, and I had 100$ in my Venmo balance that I had planned on saving, when my account got frozen they told me they had no way of getting my money back and that the money was ‚Äúreturned to senders‚Äù when I put the money in myself. Venmo Account Freezes out of control Had terrible luck with Venmo and rather than contact you if fraud is suspected they freeze your account even though there is nothing close to it. Strange that the default setting is ‚Äúpublic‚Äù I‚Äôm not sure Venmo users realize that the default setting is that every transaction is shared publicly and viewable by everyone in your contacts. Claim zero liability but issue debit cards So my daughter had money stolen from her account. Venmo claims zero liability and can‚Äôt even tell her where the money went. Needs an additional feature. My only real complaint is that it won‚Äôt let you choose the amount to deposit into your account. I use two accounts and I have to deposit all of funds into one account or not at all.  Wish I could choose how much I want to deposit between the two accounts.

THEY STEAL I have had my account frozen for a month now because I made a second account for my business. Okay I find out not allowed. I delete the other account. Save yourself the stress and worry and go through a different app. These people don‚Äôt know what they‚Äôre doing and the app seems less than trustworthy now!

Joint Bank Accounts My one star review is solely based on the fact that Venmo does not allow multiple users (with separate accounts) to use the same bank account. This is a very limiting policy and makes use of the service annoying and cumbersome for people who share bank accounts (which, I have to think are many people in the married and over 30 crowd). Other services similar to Venmo do not have this limitation and if given the choice, I would use one of the other services that make transfer of my money easier.

Easy navigation of the App but not easy to get your money App is easy to use however it can be inconvenient because it only supports my debit card for withdrawal ( for me to pay someone) but I cant transfer funds in Venmo to it! Make no sense to me. So instead of getting money right away ( duh , that‚Äôs the way we all want our money!) I have to wait three days for a bank transfer. Frustrating to say the least. Please FIX it Venmo. You can take money off my card but not put it on? I call *BS üòê

Pat Poole This app is horrible. My rental company uses this app. When I tried to pay my rent using the app it declined the app even though I had it linked to my bank. I called the bank and they said that it was not even attempted to payed. So I contacted the app and they said I needed to prove my identity and I did as instructed and it still would not process the 2500. Rent payment.

Unexplained error I‚Äôve had Venmo for quite some time now and have loved it ever since, but I recently have been unable to make transfers to my debit card on file. I need the funds now and cannot wait 1-3 business days to have them sent to my bank account. I‚Äôm currently dissatisfied until that issue is resolved.

Easy to use I love the convenience of using Venmo for various small purchases and payments. The only thing I would change about it would be not having the 25 cent fee to transfer money instantly but that‚Äôs such a small price to pay for having instant money in my account that it‚Äôs totally worth it!

Malfunction The app had worked great for me up to the last month. When I tried updating my card to a new one it wouldn‚Äôt allow me to do so. Then when I tried to insert my bank account number the screen remained blank for what seemed like hours. I tried erasing the application and downloading it again but that didn‚Äôt change anything. Finally the app settled for an error message and it‚Äôs been like that for days. I don‚Äôt think I can trust them with my money if I can‚Äôt navigate through their app and do the things that the app promised I could do.

Mimi I don‚Äôt care for Venmo at all the fact that I can‚Äôt get my transfer immediately bothers me, I downloaded this because cash app was down and my husband needed me to pay contractor . Needless to say I ended up spending money in my Acct for another bill to pay him because transfer didn‚Äôt come thru in time. Which put me I a bind the entire weekend. I will never use this app again it‚Äôs pointless I definitely like cash app better faster and secure. Venmo want even allow me to add my credit card for instant payout from capital one and it‚Äôs a actual bank card

So easy to pay! No need to write checks to people who can‚Äôt take your card. If they have an account you can transfer it in with a few clicks. They do have a ‚Äúpublic feed‚Äù option similar to FB; but I like that it can be private...you can lock down the account as far as you want very easily.

Frustrating It has no problem linking a credit card quickly, but when I try to link a bank account it makes it difficult and takes until the following day to ‚Äúverify‚Äù the account. So you can‚Äôt use the bank account right away.

Great Customer Service I had an issue with my account and received excellent customer service from both chat and phone departments. Megan was clear and concise in her chat help and Jay was extremely helpful and called me back to follow up and make sure everything was corrected. Great app that‚Äôs easy to use accompanied with great customer service.

Frozen account for no reason? Apparently in their user agreements, you aren‚Äôt allowed to use it as a goods and services outlet payment. Which is I guess fine if that‚Äôs what I was using my account for! They froze my account indefinitely with this reason because people were paying me for ‚Äúvideos‚Äù... too bad they meant family video, redbox, and GameFly. I had to go in and remove all my bank info because venmo kept moving money around. I messaged customer support to delete my account all together and I‚Äôm still waiting for them to do it. DON‚ÄôT TRUST THIS APP OR COMPANY. Only PayPal for me!
So convenient Venmo started it all, and even now keeps my loyalty. Good job!

Avoid at all costs My account was broken from day one. I could not be located by my friends to make payment. I mentioned this support and they only offered solutions that didn‚Äôt actually fix the root cause of the issue, which is a tech issue at their end. Then, when a friend tried to pay me using my email address, it didn‚Äôt go to me. I have talked to support and they only offer scripted responses. Each time I contact support, I get a different person. Not a marker of good customer service. Venmo has completely lost my trust and I am deleting my account.
Love it! Convenient, everyone in my fam and at work has it. Makes doing food runs and running errands for people a lot less of a hassle.
Like cash, but better This has become an app I‚Äôm convinced everyone needs.

Quick. Easy. Simple. No complaints thus far in my use of this app. Quicker and easier than PayPal, but with the same high level of security. Only thing that would make it better is if you wanted the money now there wasn‚Äôt a charge for it. But a day or two wait is well worth it‚Äôs convenience.

Steal your money I was liking the app a lot and was gonna be using it long term untill I had to send my mom a large transfer then Venmo made a issue they took the money out of my bank account then didn‚Äôt put it in my moms even though they stole the money from my account and now they want way to personal information considering this app isn‚Äôt a bank and just a app to send and receive money I don‚Äôt recommend if you make transfers more then $300 which could be for rent or something hopefully they remedy this and my stolen money isn‚Äôt in limbo

Why is it difficult to find the submit buttons? I wanted to make a simple payment to someone. The site doesn‚Äôt make it easy to recognize how to advance forward, like ‚ÄúNext step‚Äù buttons. I have to hunt for it, go back and forth at different options. And I‚Äôm pretty computer savvy. Makes me rather think twice about using this app. I wouldn‚Äôt recommend it because it would be difficult to assist someone having to describe it because it‚Äôs not visually easy.

Sure. Sure. I‚Äôll leave a review. It‚Äôs been cool to pay people more conveniently I guess. Somehow it feels more convenient than PayPal. Even though you can‚Äôt get your money immediately for $0.50 (or whatever and this may have changed). But that was my only reason to use PayPal over Venmo. But good job Venmo. You‚Äôve done nothing wrong to me

Team Venmo I love venmo . Much more secure than scamming cash app . You can actually speak to a human with venmo , I‚Äôve never had my money stolen and any problems I‚Äôve had that occurred there is MULTIPLE ways to speak to someone . I wish they let you take money from a pre paid card but that‚Äôs the only thing I would change !

Transfer This app will tell you that when you transfer funds that it‚Äôll be there the next day but possibly 3 and business days they mean. There‚Äôs not a card that allows instant transfers. This app is ridiculous. I call support and they‚Äôre very rude and inconsiderate. Oh and I have yet to find out where I can even buy things with venmo. Tried to make a purchase thru Walmart. Walmart cancelled my order for some reason and they have never done that with any other form of payment. I suggest not using this app it‚Äôs very time consuming with funds.

Good until it isn‚Äôt. For the basic purposes Venmo was sufficient and met my needs. Unfortunately somehow my information was leaked and my Venmo account cloned. A substantial amount of money was stolen from me and Venmo‚Äôs customer service is almost nonexistent. I‚Äôve tried to contact them and I‚Äôve only gotten automatic responses that say I need to wait 1 to 4 business days for someone to reach out to me. Meanwhile Venmo is just allowing people to siphon money. I would think their system would flag 12 consecutive payments to an unknown user. Unfortunately instead, Venmo has left me assed out.

I ‚ù§Ô∏è Venmo Venmo has made part of my daily life better! I can use with mom friends and friends for groups, meetings, room mom money, dinner, play dates and too many things to list. I recently needed support for an issue and and that was convenient and pleasant interaction as well! I also find the Venmo card a convenient option.
Great! No issues so far.

Wish I could give zero stars I have been trying for over a year to get your application to work. You cause my bank account to be locked multiple times. Now I can‚Äôt even add a Wells Fargo account to your application?! This is insane. How can you be a top application for money transfers and you can‚Äôt even connect a Wells Fargo account? Your application has way too many issues for me even consider continuing to use your application. It‚Äôs a good thing that Apple has ApplePay now because that means that I don‚Äôt have to use your trash application anymore.

Terrible!  Absolutely Useless for me I‚Äôve spent a week trying to get the service working, verified my bank‚Äôs checking account but always unable to send money.  After trying multiple times over multiple days I finally chatted with Customer Support.

Outstanding! Venmo is a great way to pay or receive money, from friends, family or for business! Payments are fast and transactions are secure. Just be sure that the payment is correctly identified because you can‚Äôt change a payment after it is made!

Scam artist!!! This is the worst money transfer app I‚Äôve ever used. I sent my son money to loan him and all went well. When it came time for him to send money back, it came into my account and they won‚Äôt release it, saying it‚Äôs my banks fault. My bank has not noticed any denials and yet these clowns still will not release my $250.

Stay away!!! Horrible service and you have no rights Don‚Äôt bother with them and if you have an account delete it, eventually they will steal money. I sent a someone funds and they didn‚Äôt notify me that it was a frozen account and when I requested my funds to be returned they kept using the excuse that the reviving party‚Äôs account was frozen and that person needed to work with Venmo. If the person walks away from the account like the person I sent the funds to  Venmo keeps the funds ‚Äúfrozen‚Äù forever, in reality they keep it after x amount of years.

DONT USE Like many other people here, I tried transferring money into my mothers account that was linked to my bank account. Her account was frozen and I replied by to support with her DL. I called customer service but to not avail they provide no help. What‚Äôs the point of customer service if you can‚Äôt resolve the issue then and there?? Anyways, I have a car payment to make and I am unable to because your funds get frozen along with the account.

Won‚Äôt let you cancel a payment Venmo is making me responsible for a payment from a fraudulent transaction, even though the payment didn‚Äôt go through. I called my bank and told them to block the payment. My bank recognized the fraud, but Venmo paid the fraud anyway, despite my attempts to stop the payment. Venmo took back some of the money, that was left in this fraudster‚Äôs account. Now Venmo is making me responsible for what it couldn‚Äôt take back, even though they basically recognized it as a fraud and tried to take back the money. I don‚Äôt get it.

Disconnects my account constantly Convenient and great ... when it works. But every time I try to quickly send someone money plaid has disconnected my bank. This is unacceptable and if it is not resolved soon I will be deleting. Why waste the storage space on a useless app?

author_name: Now I'm negative due to Venmo
review_body: Horrible Tried transferring money to my son in the Marine Corp. and they took the money from my account and they wouldn‚Äôt allow his account to accept the money. Now it shows-20. My father also sent $60 and my son tried putting it back to his grandpa. My dads account now says -60.... we are out 80 dollars and my Marine has nothing

You need more user testing The green ‚Äúrequest‚Äù button (after you already click the first request button) does not look like a button. It looks like a success message. I had to check with the person that the request went through the first time I tried, and it did not go through because I did not recognize that as a button.

Venmo I was able to use Venmo until recently. I chatted with a rep. They couldn't help or explain why transactions weren't going through. They said to call my financial institution and they said it was nothing on their end they couldn't even see attempted transactions. I'm disappointed in Venmos inability and or desire to try and help resolve my situation.

They restricted my account Venmo restricted my account because they were suspicious about ‚Äúbusiness activities‚Äùon my account. I accepted money from multiple people for a fundraiser and now i have to use another app such as cashapp or paypal because venmo was suspicious. The suspicion isn‚Äôt always correct so you can‚Äôt just go around suspending account because on what you think is happening on my account. I also emailed them and asked for the information and reports about my account and they have yet to answer. I am absolutely and utterly livid right now!!!

Trash. This application is trash. Apparently there is a six card limit for Venmo for security reasons, and honestly, I can‚Äôt think of a single soul that knows about this. I am now having to jump through hoops to transfer my funds because I cannot add another card... and adding my bank instantly NEVER works.

Easy money This app is easy to use. Whether making a payment or requesting money, the interface is easy to use & pretty straightforward. When you can get your mother-in-law to use it without needing to call you, you know you‚Äôve got a winner. Moving payments to you bank accounts is really easy too.

Overall easy and convenient Makes it easy to pay people when you bank differently. Even nice that you can pay right in iMessage. One suggestion would be making it easier to toggle between different accounts you may pay people from‚Äîlike on the final screen, rather than having to go to settings every time.

Suspended I made an account, and almost immediately had my account suspended. I didn‚Äôt even have enough time to add a card or a bank to my account. I messaged the support and got an automated response that seemed to imply that my account was suspended due to insufficient funds, which isn‚Äôt possible due to it being frozen before I could even setup funds. The automated message also asked for more info, which I sent, but I have not received another reply. My rating will remain 1 star unless the support team helps me resolve this in a reasonable amount of time.

Instant transfer bs I‚Äôve been using venmo for a long while now and it use to be great. Instant transfer was smooth, but not my account continues to say it‚Äôs no longer available or that ‚Äúit doesn‚Äôt work‚Äù. Reached out to twitter support and all they could say was it‚Äôs no longer available for me but that I can use the bank transfer option. I have a ton of bills that need to be paid and are now late because the instant transfer no longer works for me. Such bs! I have been a loyal user to this app and they could not even fix or reinstate it for me.
Please do not put the change payment button next to confirm payment button Whenever sending payment through venmo,

Infuriating I tried to sign up for Venmo and they claimed my phone number was already attached to another account. I‚Äôve never downloaded Venmo before so it can‚Äôt be me. When I called customer support I sat on hold for over half an hour before giving up. Then I tried contacting them online via the support form, except they required an email and phone number attached to a Venmo account, which I don‚Äôt have and can‚Äôt create. It‚Äôs an infuriating circle and now I‚Äôm going to be downloading a different app instead of trying to deal with this. Thanks for nothing.

Happy Customer I heard about Venmo from my son.  I am not tech savvy.  However,  Venmo makes my transactions quick and easy.  No more going to my bank, to the go to another‚Äôs bank, no writing checks and waiting for them to be received by mail, and then having to wait for them to be cashed.  Money is available in seconds!  AWESOME!

Makes life easy...saves trips to the atm ü§ó This really is convenient to use to pay and receive money. Takes two seconds and you have a record of it, no more trips to the atm to get cash out to pay someone back. All my friends have Venmo now. It‚Äôs great! Good - could be better I don‚Äôt like the interface. No clear actions to take. Muddle through the transaction eventually.

My money, my business. My kid‚Äôs music instructor uses this app for payment. Can you tell me why you put peoples money moves  on blast? Who paid who? Really? My purchases better not show up up. I went through settings and fixed everything I could. I have too many stalkers and nebby people in my business as it is. Lil, unnerving ya know?

Venmo is the go to app to send money when help is needed! Venmo has been my favorite app to send and receive money payments or send money to friends and family especially when you can't get to a WU or MoneyGram. It's easy, fast and free or lowest transaction fees that I know.

Reliable I‚Äôve been using venmo for 3 years now and absolutely love it. I never carry cash around anymore. Only issue is the 2(ish) days it takes to drop into your account once you get paid/transfer it. Love that you can link multiple bank account with it and that it also not has Touch ID

My life is 10x Easier Venmo makes my life ten times easier. No more checks or going to the bank to pull out cash. Thanks for providing such a trustworthy service that works well not only on my side with making payments but also receiving payments and transferring the money back into my account!
Venmo For the Win This is one of the greatest ideas I've ever see. This is single handedly going to change how people transfer money.

I have to put in my bank information every time! I use a few different apps to pay and request money from people and Venmo is my least favorite. I constantly have to renter my bank information because it says it lost connection to my bank account. It takes so many steps to just pay someone and it should be such an easy process. Also I think it‚Äôs a breech of privacy to be able to see all of the random people who paid people in your contacts. I don‚Äôt know why that is anyone‚Äôs business.

Constant issues Locked my account down for reasons I didn‚Äôt know fixed everything they asked only for my account to be messed up since. I can‚Äôt use my card no matter how much is in my account and will not allow me to add my bank debit card either. Not the first time I‚Äôve experienced this and when I confront them for help it‚Äôs always the say ‚Äúfor security reasons we can‚Äôt see why this is happening. It‚Äôs an automated system please give it a few days and try again.‚Äù Will not use or recommend to anyone

This is the worst system I‚Äôve ever used! If I could give 0 stars I would! This is by far the worst system I‚Äôve ever used for money transactions. My account was frozen for no given reason with a $60 balance in it that I‚Äôm apparently no longer entitled to. Another $75 was sent to me through messenger and it went to my Venmo account that was still linked to it. I never unlinked it because if the account is frozen there should be no activity I would think. Well not with Venmo! They will take money coming in but not let money go out

No Funds When Needed I was not happy on January 19 when my brother Venmo‚Äôd me $400 for a deposit on my car,& it never came through till 3 days later!! I had to take money out of my rent so I could put deposit down for my car, which I didn‚Äôt want to do ‚Äîbut had no choice. Isn‚Äôt that the whole purpose of sending funds securely through your app & having it transfer within a few minutes not days?!!!

Convenient I love this app way better then Cash App. The transfer fee is very reasonable and there is a limit to the fee that they charge to transfer unlike Cash App. The app is easy to use. They offer a card that you can use if you don‚Äôt want to transfer the money to your bank account.

Great payment app with no privacy Venmo is an easy way to pay friend‚Äôs. Transactions are easy and fast.  Hover (and this is a big one) your friends list is public, to everyone, even if you are set to private.  So everyone in your phone contacts and Facebook is available for everyone to access.

Needs more customization Good app. I would like to see the ability to segregate and label specific funds. I would like to keep that money separate from say my personal or business expenses.

Too Picky The app has become to picky with what cards they let you use with it. The card I had linked for ages all of the sudden didn‚Äôt work. No warning. My payment ended up basically unusable for several days. Customer service was no help. They just want you to get the Venmo card. I was disappointed. Otherwise it had been a great service.

Bye I officially despise Venmo. I don‚Äôt even want to get into the exact specifics of how this app has given me trouble time and time again. All I came here to say is, when you need your money, Venmo will find a way to inconvenience TF out of you. I only give it two stars because I am a diplomatic person that tries to see both sides of an issue and perhaps all of the unnecessary hoops I‚Äôm always jumping through for this app, is all for the good of data security and what not. Regardless though, Cash app all the way.

Love it. I wish this app had been created years ago! It‚Äôs perfect for paying back friends or even someone across the country safely and instantly without your bank account being involved at all! I haven‚Äôt had any issues at all and I‚Äôve already used it four times!

Had to create a whole new account Because I switched phone numbers and no longer have the credit card attached to the app, I couldn‚Äôt update my account to my new phone number. The only solution was to email support and provide a ton of info to maybe get my account reset in a few days. No option to talk to someone directly. Decided to create a new account using a different email as that was easier since I was trying to purchase an item on the marketplace and couldn‚Äôt wait. Not impressed.

DO NOT USE!! I had money transferred to me for an emergency and when trying to do an instant transfer the app tells me that it won‚Äôt process that and to try a standard transfer. That is not an option for me as it is, like I said, an emergency. I talked to chat support and they were unable to retrieve any other info outside of the fact that the transfer was declined, which the app had already told me. Try Zelle! Don‚Äôt risk it with Venmo!  I‚Äôm now stranded 3 hours from home with a hotel that I already paid for but don‚Äôt have the deposit for because of this app.

Bank Account under construction I wish that all these apps didn‚Äôt always have to route thru your checking account. Why isn‚Äôt there a way that you could put a credit card on file..why just your debit card? Sometimes people accounts get overdrawn (seriously not a fault of my own) by a HUGE AMOUNT and there should be a way where we don‚Äôt have to be a slave to our bank accounts. There should be other outlets and routes. Idk maybe it‚Äôs just me..but it‚Äôs annoying. We should be able to put/use whatever we want.

Great app, high fees I use this all the time and it‚Äôs great. It was even better when it was only $.25 to transfer money to your bank immediately; now they charge 1%.  Still better than Cash App which I think charges 1.5%. If somebody pays me on a Friday I have to wait until Monday to get my money without paying a fee.

Adding our debit card I tried add a debit card from a joint account owned by my wife and I first to her Venmo account and the to mine. For some reason it is not permitted. Guys there are still plenty of us out there that have joint accounts and we should both be able to use Venmo to move our money. Fix this please.

Ran into a issue and problems not getting resolved I sent a money to a wrong person and tried to contact via chat trying to get hold of someone so i can resolve this issue. But you not helping my money issue. This is not one time issue. Your customer service got to be better than a person just copy and pasting the problem and resolution.

Frozen I have been using this app for a while and liked until I got a notification that my account was frozen and I had to prove that I am the owner and send a copy of my ID. I was not given a specific explanation of what I did wrong date time or to who I did that broke the rules. So I will go back to my other apps for my money transfer needs

Venmo Rating Overall, i would absolutely recommend this app. Especially if you‚Äôve already plan Or planned, on using this app as if it were a secondary or any kind of ‚ÄòBack-Up‚Äô source. Definitely useful & it‚Äôs a ‚ÄòCommon Sense‚Äô app. If you have issues or any problems with this app than it‚Äôs most definitely self-caused. Love this app!

Pay with two sources? Overall I love the app, just wish I could pay with my Venmo balance and my bank at the same time if the balance of one is not enough to cover the entire charge. Ie I owe John $5 but only have $3 in Venmo. I wish I that instance I could use the $3 in Venmo and it would automatically pull the remaining $2 from my bank on the same transaction. Just a thought.

Best Cash App Ever Venmo is so easy to use! It makes it quick and easy to see all my transactions in one places. I recently got the Venmo card and this thing is better than gold! It allows you to use the funds in your account instantly without the wait period of transferring to your bank account.

People behind the app! Accidentally connected wrong bank account to app so I called in, held for just a little bit and then talked with a real human! Very helpful. Fixed me up and got me going in no time. Very knowledgeable about what needed to be done. Thank you. Great customer service.

the yearbook for 4th graders is now a financial app people ask me to use I really don‚Äôt want to have to see the financial transactions of strangers when I log in to deal with something, when someone asks me to pay on Venmo.  Yes you can then navigate away from that. If it‚Äôs the home screen. Yuk.

Stupid Security I can‚Äôt believe their system can put a hold on an account, without giving any information except ‚Äúit‚Äôll fall off in a few days.‚Äù There‚Äôs no override and we‚Äôre just supposed to wait it out. I even linked another bank account (although the first told me they didn‚Äôt have an issue with my using Venmo) hoping that would remove the security hold.
Venmo Once I was set up by my son, sending him money has been realllllly easy and quick.  This from a senior who is sooo 20 th century she almost always needs tech help.

Bad customer service and system I‚Äôve using this APP for 4 years, and I loved it until recently. I‚Äôm not able to complete my payment, it told me I‚Äôm having issues and try it later, but not telling me what exactly the issue is. I‚Äôve Ben trying for 3 days and it won‚Äôt work. The customer service told me they couldn‚Äôt see what‚Äôs the exactly issue is, it‚Äôs blocked by the system! and they literally told me to switch to PayPal or wait! Isn‚Äôt it ridiculous? If they don‚Äôt know what‚Äôs wrong, how can they help??? It‚Äôs so disappointing. That‚Äôs it, I‚Äôm leaving this app!

Bad Overall I really don‚Äôt like it, my bank account was disconnected for an unknown reason I had to re-link it.  I think the social aspect of the platform is more annoying than useful and I find it detracting from simply doing what you‚Äôre supposed to do with this program which is to make payments.

üí∏ Venmo makes my crazy busy life so easy! I can coordinate events with my friends & get their $$$ without having to visit each one and get physical cash. Also, for my friends who don‚Äôt have the same bank as me, it makes it easier to transfer $$$ without having to get confused with different apps.

Makes My Life Easier Thanks to Venmo I don‚Äôt have to write checks to pay many of my bills anymore. And I‚Äôve also been able to send friends out of state money without paying extortionist money transfer fees. I appreciate the convenience this app has given me when it comes to handling my money!

Great to send $ but horrible constant notification While the app itself is great to send last minute money or quickly collect money from family and friends. I find it extremely annoying and quite frankly disturbing how Venmo feels that is their obligation to send me notification for any transactions that people in my contact list give $ to others. I‚Äôm getting alerts that people who I have not interacted with in years are sending money for random stuff, only because they‚Äôre in number is saved in my contact list.

Honest opinion Easiest way to pay and receive money. I only wish they would change the fact that you need a reason, I believe filling in that spot should be optional. Everything else is perfect though and that one complaint is fairly nit picky so overall a very useful app. Thanks venmo

NOT USER FRIENDLY WHEN U HAVE PROBLEM Direct linked Venmo to my bank( didn‚Äôt manually enter info, system setup did it automatically and said my bank account linked to Venmo)I made a payment, Venmo says accounts didn‚Äôt link, going to send me to collections but provide zero help from their end.  They said they‚Äôd send small deposits to my account and I need to confirm the amounts, went to app, no way to confirm anything, what do I do now, completely annoying and not user friendly.  Guess I‚Äôll spend another hour of my time today to try and straighten it out.  üôÑüò°
Horrible app I really wish I could give negative stars! This app & their customer service is horrendous.
