Continued problems I keep having an error message come up with a card that I‚Äôve used before and customer service can‚Äôt seem to help

Unsure I don‚Äôt want a newsfeed of transactions neither do I want others to view my exchanges. Maybe add a feature that allow me to disable the news feed. If it already exists please make it more plain to find. Some people use this app because it requested or required. I‚Äôd rather others not see any of my money in motion. It‚Äôs weird in the first place. Thats similar to seeing a list of someone‚Äôs ATM withdrawals.

I Owe You I love this app! I feel like my friends and I can be more social and go and do things and just pay each other back and forth! No more I owe you's that never get paid back and no more trying to split a check or have 5 different cards to pay for dinner!

Instant transfer unreliable. Randomly stopped working I loved Venmo and depended on it to get rent money from my roommates every month. One day, the instant transfer feature stopped working. Just a generic error message with no recourse. It was after 5PM, so their support is closed.

Great app Love this App I know there‚Äôs lots of other apps but this was the very first and last app I‚Äôm gonna use. It‚Äôs super easy to use and lots of people I know have it thank you Venmo for creating such an effective way to safely send our loved ones money any place, anywhere at any time in the world

Can‚Äôt get refund I paid a Kathleen Cucci $45 for a student fundraiser. She said she didn‚Äôt have an account  with PayPal. So to pay John Cucci, which I did.. $45. But I cannot get the refund back from the other inactive account, that was under Kathleen Cucci. She said she tried to access account, but can‚Äôt help. Can you? PayPal, pls help!

Apple Pay is better! Apple Pay is way better, have tried several times to get my bank to connect and it won‚Äôt. I have added a card and I had money sent to me and the option to transfer says select a card or bank but once you click it the option only gives you the bank which is won‚Äôt let me connect to so the money that was sent to me is just stuck until the app decides to actually work and connect with my bank!

It does it‚Äôs job. It works well. I‚Äôve never had a problem with money transfers. I find the social media aspect to be pretty ridiculous for a banking app. It just seems pointless to see what my friends are paying each other. Maybe it‚Äôs totally normal. But I find it pretty weird.

Doesn‚Äôt function properly... I linked my information and waited 3 days because that was the only option to link my information. After this extended period of time, I finally, and falsely, believe that I will be able to transfer a small amount of money using this app, which is kind of its main purpose, except it says ‚ÄúThis transaction was declined. Try again later.‚Äù I want to uninstall this app now because it has wasted enough of my time in getting it to work...

Pretty Convenient (Now that I‚Äôve received the Venmo CaÕèrÕèd...) But BEFORE I got the card in the mail, it was pretty much useless and annoying. In fact, I was going to just close my account and delete the app, but the card came so I decided to give it one last try, and I am happy that I did!

Really Fed Up with Venmo I have been a loyal PP customer for years. Upon learning that PP and Venmo are connected I thought this would be great. Everything I try with Venmo is an issue. I have funds in my PP account, but can‚Äôt add my PP card as a payment form on Venmo. Can‚Äôt email them about it because apparently my new iPhone with it‚Äôs most updated software and updates doesn‚Äôt have a supported browser for Venmo. I‚Äôm done with this app. I have several other money moving apps none of which are this different to set up or use.

What the heck, it only works one way Got this app on the advice of several of my adult children, works efficiently but I noticed right away that I could only send money to them,  somehow they cannot get their Venmo to sync with mine and send me the money they owe me. Has anyone else experienced this phenomenon?

Good and almost great The only real issue is Venmo allows you to send money instantly to a friend, from your bank, but to put money into your own account it can take up to 3 days. And no splitting payments between Venmo and your Debit/Bank also can be inconvenient. Otherwise I love it, and once they have the option for a full checking I‚Äôd never use a real bank again.

This app is pathetic Whatever you do don‚Äôt use Venmo. The app never works and I have $100 balance which I can‚Äôt get to. I can‚Äôt even download Venmo again after having to delete it due to problems. There are better ways of transferring money. Do yourself a favor

Easy way to pay This is a fail proof app! I‚Äôve paid and accepted payment numerous times with much success. Have not experienced any tampering with my bank account the $ is drafted from. So far so good! I will continue to use and continue to recommend over Apple Pay!

It needs to have partial balance usage before going over to bank account. It should allow usage of the Venmo balance, even when balance not enough, before going over to the bank account for the rest of the balance when paying people.

Discussed, disappointed I can‚Äôt say enough be careful! I have been using Venmo for awhile but recently I have been frozen out of my account. Venmo is saying they paid a friend on my behalf when my bank didn‚Äôt honor the payment. It this is so then why have I received two NSF fees? They have also taken all the Girl Scout fundraising money out of my account to pay back money I don‚Äôt owe. Seriously being in the financial industry for over 10 years and now in a law office for over 12 years all I can say is be careful!

They delete your account if you use it a lot I use my Venmo  to pay for rent. Pay for bills and spilt things with friends. Recently I got an email from Venmo stating they deleted my account because I had to many transactions with people who weren't my "friends"? Really??? They said they wouldn't protect my funds either. Thankfully I had no money in my account but if I had the would of KEPT IT. This isn't the first time also. They have frozen my account for the same reason before and kept my $400.

New Star in the mobile sky I feel safer using this than any other application available. That‚Äôs what counts. There are a lot of dubious characters in the world of finance. It‚Äôs good to know there is an option wherein you feel safe sending money/making a payment. Thanks

Want to withdraw your money? Nope Tried to get rent through Walmart using a money order and my card kept getting declined. So I go to withdraw from an atm and it still gets declined. I called customer support and he told me it was auto blocking the transaction and there was nothing he could do about it and he asked me to ask one of my friends if I could Venmo them the money and they give me cash?Thanks for the $125 late fee because I couldn‚Äôt pay my rent on time! 10/10 would not recommend. PayPal is the way to go.

Great app limits need to increase! Great app loving it and so convenient but would be nice if the weekly limits were not so low. Zelle has $2500 per day wonder why Venmo can‚Äôt do the same. And would be nice if logging in online was an option and not just through the app. Otherwise totally love this app and use it very often so thanks for making it!
Connection issues Never had problems before,  but today it took me 6 hrs to finally make a payment.

I don't need to see everyone else's transactions Works fine for what it is, but I don't care to see all my contacts' transactions. At all. I have a lot of current and previous tenants in my phone, as well as acquaintances I hardly know on a personal level. It's just annoying that all of their transactions pop up. Like, why are we spying on each other's activities? I hate it.

author_name: Won't be ysing this app again.
review_body: Sent money to incorrect person with same name. There need to be changes made with more details included when making payments to individuals‚Äô names so these mistakes do not occur if funds are not refundable. I‚Äôm very disappointed and feel as a matter of principal it‚Äôs worth litigation.

Terrible I tried to tell them about how my account was accessed by someone else and they refuse to unfreeze my account. I‚Äôve sent countless pictures and emails to try and fight the matter and they didn‚Äôt even try to understand. You just get like an automated email with a different name. And forget trying to talk to a person because they are just going to refer you right back to emailing the ‚Äúspecialist‚Äù because they don‚Äôt have a ‚Äúphone‚Äù number you can reach them by. I will never use Venmo again

Easy and has it all Love it on your finger tip, has both private and public, also you are sure that money got to them, I don‚Äôt need Write check to any one , also I can tell my friends to buy me or pay me and don‚Äôt have to worry on paying back

Can‚Äôt sign in I got a new phone. Tried signing in and it says wrong password. So I reset the password. Then typed it in and it still says incorrect password. I did this like 10 times. Won‚Äôt let me in.

Venmo is the worst app to use to transfer money. I used to love the app when I was send money to friends and family. Then one day I got on and I planned on send money to a close friend when I get a message say my account as been frozen. So I quickly email this company and wait 3 full day to get an email say sorry we can‚Äôt do anything since you broke agreement it didn‚Äôt say what agreement I broke so i could actually see if I did but since all this happen I‚Äôm just deleting the app and use a more reliable one

Mediocre The app is OK but it‚Äôs not my favorite. I much prefer the cash app - it‚Äôs simpler, more straightforward and easier to use. I was excited about the Venmo card to be able to tap in to my balance when not using the app. Unfortunately they missed the memo on convenience and it does not work with Apple Pay (like the debit card that comes with Cash App does) The last thing I need is one more physical card to carry in my wallet! Ordering it was a waste of time.

Efficient, easy, and fun! Very easy to send and request money to others along with depositing that money into your bank account. Plus it‚Äôs fun to see the titles on those that keep their transactions public! Must-have for those that don‚Äôt carry cash regularly!

Wrong payee First time using Venmo and I picked the wrong person with the same name. Now I am trying to get the money returned with no luck so far. I think I will retreat to the age of dinosaurs writing checks and sending them to a known address in the mail. Or maybe even just stick with PayPal. Much easier.
Combine pay methods App should allow you to use your in app credit as a partial payment and complete it with another payment method

Unexpectedly unsupported card I have used Venmo for months and all of a sudden in an emergency my Venmo money wouldn‚Äôt transfer to my card when I looked in my account on Venmo it said they no longer support my card?!?! No notification at all they just dropped it and my boyfriend had already transferred over money so I had to get a Venmo brand card and it takes ten business days. So the lady at Walmart ended up paying the difference on my car. Thanks Venmo

Do not recommend I used this app RELIGIOUSLY for two years and then all of a sudden my bank account wasn‚Äôt verified anymore. And there is no EASY way for me to add my bank account again. Even adding it with logging into my bank doesn‚Äôt work which is supposed to be instant.  It‚Äôs also so inconvenient that it takes 3ish days to transfer to your bank unless you pay for the instant transfer. I will be finding a new app for transferring money to my friends and people who pay the bills.

The worse I will never redownload the Venmo app! I requested the Venmo card thinking it would be better rather than connecting my account. The Venmo card ‚Äúsuppose to be ready to use once activated‚Äù, but EVERYWHERE I went or try to use it declined the transaction. I went to a atm try to withdraw money and it said error, so I required a balance inquiry and it shows the funds are available!!!!! I try to contact someone about the issue and all you get is the automated BS! The only reason there‚Äôs a start is because it‚Äôs mandatory.

It WAS good I used this account for my job (I own a small company) and needed to use it quite frequently. Then one day out of nowhere I am not able to add a new bank card. I contact them and try to figure out why but they can‚Äôt tell me why. When I ask how I am able to find out I don‚Äôt get an answer. So if you want to use this app don‚Äôt use it for your job/business. They are really screwing me over with this, plus I have a little bit of money on my account and I don‚Äôt know how to get it out now.

Won Over I was skeptical at first, and never tried it until recently. I was afraid I wouldn‚Äôt be able to figure it out since I feel that I am not so tech savvy these days. Works great, only used it a couple times but have a feeling I will be using it more. Such a easy and hassle-free way to pay and receive payments.

IAS I should be a representative of Venmo! I tell every person about the convenience and ease of using Venmo, the Venmo chat, and the new Venmo card that people ask if I work for Venmo. They all said they would get the app and could not wait to get the card. The reason I speak to others about it is because I love it. Hire me! üòÅ

Money in my Locked account Apparently Venmo thinks I am not worthy enough to use their services and permanently barred me from using their app.. I email them to find out exactly why.. and didn‚Äôt get a response explaining why.  I then asked them what I need to do to retrieve the money I have in my Venmo account... either return it back to the sender or let me transfer it to my linked account... it‚Äôs been over a month and I am yet to recieve a viable answer.. I only gave 1 star because 1/2 a star isn‚Äôt an option.  Very disappointing

Fabulous customer service I had an issues with a transfer and when I called for help they fixed the problem and walked me through the process. They were extremely pleasant, and friendly! Love Venmo and their customer service representatives!!

Stupid new bugs Was great but you broke the stupid app. Why release updates every week when it actually works better before you gank it up. On the pay screen it intermittently won‚Äôt show the number you‚Äôre typing to send money.  Kinda important.

Fine but can I please just send payments with the website? The only reason to restrict sending payments (the primary function of this service, by the way) to the app is just to force people to download their app. It‚Äôs transparent and stupid. I just wanted to send money to the kid whose apartment contract I‚Äôm buying this month to cover my portion of the rent. Literally never planning to use Venmo again, yet they still made me download their app just to use the service.
Not for me I guess So I really wanted to be into this app, but I just can‚Äôt.
Convenient Venmo is very convenient for paying people but it would be better if my subtitle for the payment went through to my bank account as well.

Quick, convenient and super easy. Using. Memo to pay rent and also pay back money borrowed. This has been so easy to use.  Be sure to turn on the password setting though.   Never have you phone auto sign in to the app for security purposes.

X generation person born in the 70‚Äôs First I just want to say I wasn‚Äôt a fan of sending  or receiving $$$ over a phone device. After carefully ready information about Venmo and asking my millennial son born in the late 80‚Äôs  I felt comfortable enough to try it and I been a fan since June 2018!

Great payment app I have been using them for a few months and a mistake was made on paying someone twice and they fixed it right away! They credited me the refund before they took it out of my account. The woman I spoke with on the phone was so helpful and kind. Love this app!

Simple to use. No idea why I need to provide other details Just as the title mentioned. Good interface.  However, I‚Äôm not a fan of Of the need to specify why I‚Äôm sending money every time, and I especially don‚Äôt like that the default is public, so everyone can see your transactions.
Millennial junk Why we need to mix social media with the transfer of funds I‚Äôll never understand. But whatever. At 36 years old I‚Äôm now forced to play the part of the crotchety old grandpa.

Works fine but it‚Äôs not amazing First let me say that it‚Äôs REALLY bizarre that you can see that people are paying each other. I don‚Äôt like this at all.  I don‚Äôt want to have my info shared like this even if you can‚Äôt see amounts. Secondly, it would really be great if there were some way to set up recurring payments. Besides those 2 huge issues, this is a functional & easy way to exchange money.

Convenient Very convenient but wish it allowed me to link my bank account info. It doesn‚Äôt because my husband already has it attached to his account. It‚Äôs really annoying having to transfer the amount to him so that it can be deposited.

So convenient! I‚Äôve been using VENMO for over a year. My son introduced me (millennial/27).  My renter pays his rent every month now using the app....no more waiting for the check! The only thing I worry about it security hacks ... I hope VENMO can avoid this unlike a lot of companies we hear about every day. So far no issues !

Rather not One star for the customer support agent who kept her cool. This app doesn‚Äôt even properly work when try to connect to ur bank account. I have about 400$ stuck on Venmo and nobody can seem to help.. last time I use the app. Save ur self the trouble. P.S- I‚Äôm 40 mins from home with no gas bc my money is STUCK.

Disconnected bank App randomly ‚Äúlost connection with my bank‚Äù when attempting to send money? What does that even mean? How does that make sense when I use my routing and bank account number? It says it‚Äôs as simple as removing my bank and re-adding it, but since I don‚Äôt like giving them my banking website user name and password, I have to add again using my routing number and bank account number, which takes days. This is right when I need to use venmo to send a large payment. Very frustrating.

Easiest way to pay your friends! Sometimes we don‚Äôt want to split the bill 10 different ways‚Ä¶ So, this makes it convenient to pay you back your friends or have them pay you. I also pay my lawn service this way. So grateful for Venmo!

Amazing Easy Peezy app This app is super dopeüòú I like how u can transfer the money to your bank account with no fee‚Äôs!!!!! If u want the money instantly it will cost u like .25cents but if ur ok with a max 3day wait it‚Äôs free! You can even get a card to spend ur Venmo balance, mind= blown üòù app is fun and easy to use.

So much easier, but This is faster than PayPal by a day or two, but with the technology we have it should be able to transfer money immediately, just as you can with a credit/debit card. Faster would be so much better!

Fix the issue! Very useful app, use it a lot but for the last few days I haven‚Äôt been able to see my history on the far right side of the home center in the app! It just tells me there‚Äôs been an issue loading the info and to try again in a few minutes. It‚Äôs been days. Super annoying and hope it gets fixed soon.

No I just got with Venmo and from the beginning it‚Äôs been problems, I put money on my account and my card declines everywhere but when I called customer service they stated that it‚Äôs nothing they could do because everything looked legit on my end so I was told to take my money off my card but when I went to the ATM I couldn‚Äôt even get the money off of my card for some reason it won‚Äôt let me. Now I can‚Äôt transfer my money to my bank or ANYTHING I hate that I ever made an acct with them

Venmo Isnt What It Used To Be If i could give this app a negative star i would. A couple weeks back i added my bank to venmo and transferred money to a friend of mine. My bank account is active but some how VENMO couldnt take the money from my account so that wasnt an issue on my side. A few days later i get a message saying that Venmo couldnt take out the money so I MYSELF had to pay venmo back and if i didnt pay them back they THREATENED ME with contacting a collection agency. Why should i be threatened when that was a problem on THEIR END, not mine.
Hard to know who your paying. I love what the app offers and at the price (free).

Great payment avenue Venmo makes sending money so convenient. I no longer make trips to the bank to deposit into my children‚Äôs accounts. It also allows for quick deposits and usage when they need cash right away.

Got hacked...no customer service Venmo was my favorite mobile payment app until I needed their help.  My account got hacked or something and literally NO WAY to contact Venmo support.  Since my incident I‚Äôve heard of at least 5 other friends having the same issue.

Venmo changed my biz I am a design and staging consultant. Many times clients forget to bring their checkbook to a new house. Now they can pay me on the spot via Venmo. I also do virtual consults where, again, they can pay me immediately. It has changed the way I can do business! I love it!
Worthless I joined the app for a client payment. I get the payments but now o can‚Äôt even add my card info, or banking info (manual, or auto entry).

Avoid fights üòÇ This app saved our family quarrels over money. We are a close knit family always buying something for someone or picking something up or going in on a gift and this has made our lives 100 percent better.

Stole my money This APP doesn‚Äôt work! I sent some money to a friend in college for books. When he tried to pay me back it came to my account but their automated system flagged my account when I tried to deposit it into my bank account for unknown reasons. Venmo said since it‚Äôs automated and basically sorry there is nothing they can do. At the end they wanted me to upload my banking and routing number which I‚Äôve never do on an online APP. So basically I‚Äôm out a few hundred dollars. THIS APP DOES NOT WORK AND THEY WILL KEEP YOUR MONEY!!!!!

Multiple users same bank account THE MOST irritating thing about this app which prevents me from using it much more is the banking issues. Since getting married my wife and I combined all of our banking, however only one of us (her) is allowed to access this account for sending or receiving payments. This makes the app virtually unusable for me since I can‚Äôt use my account or debit card to send receive money.

Do we really need this???? I installed this app a while back.  I have tried to figure out how to use it and see if this could be useful with my online sales.  My online attempts always takes me to a so called ‚Äúsupport community‚Äù that is populated with a bunch of useless millennial knuckleheads.  Venmo might be helpful to me to collect money from millennials that like to think they are cutting-edge and trendy. Venmo needs to replace the vague colorful marketing web pages with some meaningful explanation/instruction to support how to effectively use the system.

Not international enough I used to study in the states and had a venmo account and now that I‚Äôm out of the country a lot of people in my schools are Americans and use Venmo. However I can no longer verify my account since I no longer have American phone number and the card registered is already expired. I tried to open a new account but it only caters to American phone numbers which are super frustrating. Yeah, not really satisfied about that.

High fee for instant transfer It‚Äôs crazy they charge a fee, especially by % for instant access to your money. I can‚Äôt imagine why it costs more to transfer 100$ than 10$. Also, with apps like Zelle available now, which immediately transfer funds to your account with no transfer request and no fee, Venmo needs to catch up to speed. I think their whole deal is to get you to use their credit card.

Another useful tool. I had trouble setting it up, linking accounts, and figuring out how to pay people. I‚Äôd saw the UI could be more clear. But, once I made my first payment, it was all downhill. Making instant transfers is essential these days. Venmo comes through on that front.

App has been so glitchy A few months ago, out of nowhere I started having issues with Venmo loading, jumping to the home page, and sending me an error message along the lines of ‚Äúwe‚Äôre sorry, an error occurred.‚Äù I updated it and also deleted it and redownloaded with it hoping it would fix the issues. Location and WiFi is not a factor, I‚Äôve tried it in multiple places with no increased success.

Good service Easy to use and set up. I love the no fees. Would have given five stars if there was a option to add an attachment. Would be cool if you could. Example, if you need to split a bill and your friends and want to send everyone a copy of the receipt. Should be an easy function to add as a lot of apps have this feature.

Limited ability to see more than 20 incomplete requests I would like to be able to view all of my incomplete requests... not just the 20 most recent ones.  This makes it difficult to track everything.

Perfect Customer Service Ran into problems restoring my phone and had some issues accessing my Venmo reaches out matter of a day they were in it. Helping me with getting everything back on in a fashionable order very glad of the customer support team.

Fee I‚Äôve been using venmo for quite some time now and out of nowhere the transfer fee is 1% rather than a solid $.25 so I paid $10 without knowing because there was no notification or warning that it had gone up. Thanks Venmo. Won‚Äôt use you again.

Beware!! I tried having $900 transferred to my Visa debit card and it wouldn‚Äôt do it because it was too large of an amount for a new account. I was told this after being on hold for quite some time. The money was already transferred before I was aware of this. Now I HAVE to have it sent to my bank account and it will take one to three business days. Absolutely no warning of this anywhere before the money was transferred. There is a reason why PayPal is so large and trusted. I will never stray again.

Easy to use! Venmo is a simple and user friendly way to transfer money. Only issue I ever run into is occasionally I have to re-link my bank account. However, that could be an issue on my end. Otherwise, I highly recommend it!
Convenient With my experience regarding Venmo.  It is very easy to use and convenient. It works well with your friends when they need to pay you back. Deposit to my account with no problem.

Using funds to pay other You should have the option to use funds in account to go towards a larger payment. Eg I have 10 in Venmo account and I pay someone 20. I should have the option to have 10 from account go towards payment and other 10 from bank account

So easy to use! Venmo makes it very easy to send money to friends and family. Going to dinner with a group of people but don‚Äôt want to put down a bunch of credit cards? One person can pay and the rest can Venmo them! It‚Äôs free to use, and the process is so simple.

DO NOT GET WITH P.O. BOX Venmo will not send you a card if your only way of receiving mail is though a P.O. Box. I have been talking to various members of customer service throughout the past few days and they are completely useless, saying that I need to verify my new address. I didn't move I cannot and never have been able to receive mail at my street address! Customer service even told me that several users have had this issue, fix it then I would really love to be able to use this app!

Horrible - almost zero security and protections I had a hacker hijack my phone and port it to another carrier and a new device and Venmo allowed them to steal $2500 in an hour and I caught the whole thing within 12 hours and reported it to them.  Luckily my bank stopped the transfer and shut it down, but Venmo says ‚Äúno problem‚Äù they stepped in and funded the transactions and now I owe them $2500.  If they had an adequate waiting period for funds availability and more protections they wouldn‚Äôt have this kind of situation.  I‚Äôm not paying Venmo a dime- GOOD LUCK!

Crappy service Don‚Äôt ever get a debit card from Venmo! They will flag every purchase you make and never let you get your money off the card! When you call to resolve the issue everyone you speak with will argue against you and then act like it‚Äôs your fault. I also tried emailing and chatting with a representative and had the same issues. No one is nice and helpful. Everyone is rude. If I could give this 0 starts I would.

Love this place! Solaia is AMAZING. So sweet And we have so much fun chatting the whole time that I can barely feel the sting. I highly recommend her to anyone. She‚Äôs very reasonable and always make time to be available, and she really does just provide such a wonderful service. I always feel super comfortable with her ‚ù§Ô∏è

Easiest way ever to transfer funds I have been using Venmo for about a year. It has always worked great. I use it to transfer money to and from friends, to collect rent money from tenets, and other uses. I have never had any problems. I highly recommend it.

Great App Very nice app and easy to use. I use different accounts for business, personal, etc...so I just wish I didn‚Äôt have to go to the settings every time I want to switch bank accounts. Otherwise I‚Äôd give it 5 stars. I‚Äôm hoping the developers will consider making it more like PayPal so we can select the payment method on the go.
Easy way to send money to friends & trusted sources Super easy way to send money to friends and trusted sources. Money is sent instantly after being deducted from your Venmo balance, bank or card.

Horrible app Customer service should be 24/7 considering the fact this is my money and your app doesnt work i should be able to call anytime to work the situation out which is not the case. I will never use this app again. First time i try n have 2k transferred too me and no matter what i do it fails every time i try and transfer it to one of my debit cards meaning my money is in limbo and its sunday so i cant have the issue resolved. With all that said venmo needs to get their shlt together. As of now me n venmo are no mo.

Exactly what it should be Venmo deserves five stars because it‚Äôs an error free, fast app that brings so much convenience to the table yet costs so little for the average person to use.  It is the modern day PayPal.  Why rehash what others have inevitably said... it does exactly what it needs to, nothing more, nothing less.

Very reliable social payment app Venmo is really an easy and efficient app in my experience to use to facilitate payment between friends and family. I highly recommend it and hope they continue to provide a user friendly and worry free service.

Crashing every 10 seconds Lately it‚Äôs been freezing after the first 10 seconds of opening the app. Then it lags and catches up and is responsive for about 15 seconds, then freezes again for 10 seconds. I like Venmo but if they don‚Äôt address these crashes soon (been going on for several weeks now, also on my friend‚Äôs phone) then I‚Äôm forced to switch to Square cash or something who‚Äôs app actually works.

Weird Being able to see other people's transactions is weird. I don't think most people know to check their privacy settings before using the app. All of your Facebook friends and contacts can see what you are doing and it's a little invasive and embarrassing. But otherwise, the app works great!

Love Venmo- not great for people who share bank account I love everything about Venmo except for the fact that my husband and I share a bank account and Venmo won‚Äôt let us make deposits into the same account. So he always has to take the extra step of sending me his balance for me to transfer into our account

Venmo I initially liked Venmo and the convenience of making and receiving payments from friends.   Now I‚Äôve become very frustrated that it drops my bank connection every week or so.    Too much trouble to set up my account every week.  Time to move on to better tools.

It‚Äôs a huge inconvenience to delete my bank and then go add it back every single time I want to Venmo someone.  The bank verification process then involves typing in EIGHT different security codes that are sent to my phone. This is a huge pain and makes me hate using this app now. As I don‚Äôt have 5 minutes to completely set everything up each time I want to use it.

Great app. Don‚Äôt know why I need to be able to see other people‚Äôs transactions. I don‚Äôt like knowing things about people that I don‚Äôt need to know! It‚Äôs weird that the app shows me the transactions of other people. Why is our world so obsessed with knowing what other people are doing all the time??

Super Simple All things in life should be as simple to use as my Venmo account and my Venmo debit card. However, I use my debit card very often, and I wish there was some sort of cash back or rewards for using the card.

Horrible app. Scams. They banned my account out of nowhere and after emailing and calling multiple times I was never given a reason why my account got banned. They told me they weren‚Äôt able to provide a reason, and that they weren‚Äôt able to unban my account.
Taking back my previous review My last review said there was no option to change privacy settings on individual transactions. That actually is not the case. Updating from 3 to 5 stars.

The Art of Venmo~ Everybody‚Äôs got a friend who won‚Äôt have any money but will meet you at a restaurant and order stuff anyways. Don‚Äôt be a pushover. Avoid that awkward conversation entirely and just indirectly request a Venmo payment. 5/5 stars will def request funds from broke friends again.

Fee to transfer money to bank Before the recent update the fee was a flat $0.25 which i was fine with, after the update the fee is 1% of the money moved! THATS RIDICULOUS!!!!! I will no longer accept people to pay me through venmo and will discourage everyone i know not to do so eaither till the fee goes back to a flat $0.25!!!!!!! This is just venmo being greedy and its ruining the convenance of the app!!! Plenty of other money transfer apps that i will be using from now on!!!!!!!

2 people 1 bank account ü§® Spouses, or anyone who shares a bank account, should have the option to have more than one Venmo user on the same bank account. I find it annoying having to pay him my Venmo balance so he can transfer it to our mutual bank account.

Stay away from Venmo! Downloaded the Venmo Ap last week. Wanted to send a friend some money.  Was initially successful, but then got an email from Venmo stating that I had violated their user agreement and was permanently barred from using Venmo.  The transaction was reversed.  When I asked what I did wrong the response was ‚Äúwe don‚Äôt have to tell you - read the user agreement‚Äù.  The amount was within guidelines, there were sufficient funds in my account but....    Used the CASH Ap which worked perfectly.

Why do always have to reverify myself I really like how simple it is but frustrated that I frequently have to remove my banking info and renter it.  I am not the swiftest so it takes a while and have to use other sort of payment

Privacy seems like an afterthought Would have been 5 stars except for the "newsfeed" where I can see everyone's payments and conversations between each other. First, I don't want to see it. Second, why is the default "public"? Seems like privacy is considered unimportant.

Why isn‚Äôt there a passcode entry system I love using Venmo. I‚Äôve never had any problems with the app features. But why isn‚Äôt there a passcode, facial recognition, or fingerprint required to open the app? After all it IS a financial app and anyone could get in and start making transactions if they really wanted.

The system of payment I just tried to make a payment and I accidentally clicked on an old inactivated card. Since it got declined, I don‚Äôt know why but Venmo automatically took out the money from my VISA giving the person two payments. And now I lost double the money. I called and no one helped me. What if my child were to click on a random button. And then even though I gets declined, they take the money out from a DIFFERENT ACCOUNT. The system is not smart.

Secure! I love Venmo! I was very hesitant to use it at first, but so far I‚Äôve never had any issues. It‚Äôs very safe and secure. It is incredibly easy to pay people back when you don‚Äôt have extra cash just sitting around. I recommend it to everyone!

Live with roommates? Easy! If u live with roommates, you‚Äôve gotta have Venmo. It makes paying rent so simple!  It also is necessary for going out to eat or get drinks with friends. Venmo makes it easy to split the bill. This app is truly wonderful to have and easy to use.

Simple way to manage $$ I had Someone trying to pay me money and they wanted to do a wire transfer which required routing information and banking information. This allowed a simple transaction which felt much more secure for me

If I could give 0 I would do not use!! Warning do not use this app!! They stole $200!!! After using the app for a while after my sister sent me money due to my dog dying suddenly I don‚Äôt have access to my account. They told me I needed to send my Identification which I did and have not heard back from them. They won‚Äôt return the money back to my sister or transfer it into my account. They simply stole it!!
Venmo! The app of a lifetime! Wow! What can I say! This app has it all! You‚Äôll never need to download anything else ever again ever.

Bad Let me tell you what. I sent in December of 2017 it looked like everything was fine. He got the money and they took the money from my account. Guess what ?! The transaction was declined, and they didn‚Äôt email me or ever called me. Then 6 months after that somebody try to send me 330 dollars, but they frozen my account !!! I had no idea !!!  After 6 month ????? That is jut not respect at all. The they say ‚Äúyea what happen is that you own us money‚Äù they shouldn‚Äôt be allowed to do that I am so mad

I hate Venmo It used to be so much easier to keep from sending my daughters in college money! I used to could make up an excuse, Walmart is too far away, I‚Äôm not going by your bank‚Ä¶.   Not anymore! It‚Äôs way too easy to get money to them now! I hate Venmo!

Easy to use, quick and simple. If your family and friends use Venmo, then you should sign up and join them. Process is easy, app intuitive (even for a non-millennial or younger person), and most seem to have it.

Love it but..... I love how easy it is to use but I have tenants send me money but I can‚Äôt deposit because my husband is linked to that account and I have to wait to send to him to deposit as I‚Äôm only allowed to send a certain amount each week

Best service app in decades Venmo is simple to use, now instant, eliminates need for cash, checks, bank deposits and the business risk associated with PayPal transactions and other e-commerce applications. Favorited by my babysitter, hair stylist, friends, family members and others who want a quick way to pay without carrying cash and avoiding awkward asks and refusals.

Confused Cannot seem to figure out how to add my joint bank account info since my hubby already has the same joint acct selected for his Venmo. Any help would be greatly appreciated. I tried following the steps the app listed but still had difficulty.
Takes too long to transfer Wish it didn‚Äôt take so long to transfer into your account. Especially when they don‚Äôt even consider Saturday‚Äôs bank hours. But otherwise it‚Äôs a good app.
Hands down the best app to transfer and receive money from others The app is easy, fun, and a must have to easily and quickly pay others or be paid by others.

Do NOT use this APP Beware of there User Agreement they froze my account after my daughter sent me a few transactions over a weekend. Once frozen they won‚Äôt let you delete your account unless you send them photo ID & appeal the reason. They Also won‚Äôt tell you their decision other than you violated their User Agreement. Use CASH app instead it is so much easier. I am sure they are in violation of not following certain state laws in disclosing why your account was frozen.

Best way to transfer money peer to peer Easy to split a check, get gas money from a ride, pay people back etc. I especially love the instant transfer to bank in only a few minutes feature! Totally worth 25 cents.

Easy to use, wonderful app! I use Venmo all the time and have never had an issue with it. The app is streamlined and easy to use, never crashes or has issues. It‚Äôs the easiest way to exchange money for both work and personal!

Holding my money After 2 transactions Venmo deactivated my account without any explanation and is preventing me from retrieving my account balance.  The only way you can communicate this type of issue is via email, but mine is still unresolved.

It "pays" to download this app! I have to be honest, I was hesitant to get this because I didn't want my security to be compromised. It is so easy and wonderful. I have not had any issues at all. I love the "cha-ching" sound like a register when someone has paid you! üòÉ

Always stopping my instant transfers! I try and try and try with this ignorant app! They‚Äôre always blocking my instant transfers. Then tell me I can deposit it into my bank account using the standard option. I input my bank info. Mind you, it‚Äôs the same bank account my debit card is linked. It tells me my account is not supported. I message customer service and they NEVER give me a straight answer! As of this moment, they‚Äôre holding $663 in my Venmo. Terrible customer service!

Slow! I have an iPhone 6+ with the latest updates, but for some reason Venmo consistently runs soooo slowly. It takes upwards of 10 seconds to navigate anywhere in the app, and sometimes it doesn‚Äôt seem to respond to my touchscreen. Every other app on my phone runs without problems. It‚Äôs unfortunate that sending and requesting money through the website is now disabled.
Instant transfer. If you guys can make transfers available at least during the next hour, that would be great. Having to wait for the weekend to pass by to get my money is pretty annoying.

Money, Money, Money, MONEY! Money doesn‚Äôt grow on trees but the cash does flow on Venmo. Find a person, set an amount, push pay and presto chango you have paid your bill. It‚Äôs just as easy if they owe you just send them a bill by Venmo! If you have to pay or you owe use VENMO!!

Could be better The app does some nice things, but it is missing one fundamental capability... It won't allow you to create nicknames for your accounts. Several screens (notably the transfer screen) do not show enough detail to allow for distinction. I had to delete an account because I kept transferring money to the wrong place... This seems like a no brainer but the developers have ignored my multiple suggestions to add over several months of struggle.

Customer Service I have been back and forth with Venmo for months now. They have done a horrible job at resolving my issue. I accidentally sent money to the wrong person and was told by one of their representatives that as long as the person who mistakenly received the money confirms the mistake then they can reverse it. After that was done the money was still not reversed. I have had to jump through a million hoops and still have not received my money back.

Please make transfers Instant This app would be 5 stars if sending and receiving money hit your account instantly. I‚Äôve had to wait as long as three days to get my money; when I could have just drove to the persons house and grabbed the cash instantly. This app would be super convenient if it hit instantly. That is about it‚Äôs only flaw. Please consider changing. Thanks.

Best App ever to transfer money! Everyone needs to have this! Venmo is the new way to give money between your friends and family! It goes from one bank to another! Has made my life easier since I don‚Äôt carry cash
Settings won‚Äôt save Very annoying that i have to continue changing my settings to what i prefer instead them constantly defaulting back to the settings the app creators would like you to use

Needs to have a separate tab for paying or requesting The option to either pay money or request money are right next to each other. I accidentally sent money instead of requesting it. I quickly canceled it within a few seconds, however, It did not reverse. My bank withdrew the money from my account.

Reliable convenient easy In the 21st century Venmo has made itself a staple of simplicity and forward thinking with the convenience of transferring money between parties. I am sold on this app. You should use it if you‚Äôre not already.

Worst Customer Service Venmo is the worst for customer service and you will always have some type if issue when either sending or receiving money. They freeze your account or stop instant transfers for no reason at all. You received to much money so the system recognized as potential fraud, You‚Äôve made to many transfers so we‚Äôre limiting your account BS. I‚Äôm all about protection but when I‚Äôve used Venmo consistently then it‚Äôs not potential fraud it‚Äôs just BS.

Frozen account My account has been frozen for weeks and no one via email, phone call, nor support ticket will tell me why.  I have given all necessary documents to ‚Äúverify my identity‚Äù and I am still waiting.  I had to give random people from the company sensitive information on 4 separate occasions like address, social security number, bank routing and account number, my full discover card and still have a frozen account

Worst cash/payment app out there üò§ Downloaded app thinking it was a payment app (and several friends asked to be paid this way) but it looks more like a social media app and just wants to connect to Facebook and accumulate personal data. Just wanna pay someone- there‚Äôs not even a visible button to do that ! Took forever to find out how to send someone money. And then wanted FB friends, to see the payment and any comments - ridiculous !
No privacy (unless you set it yourself) Why would I want to know who's paying who for what?!
Payments done quickly Venmo has worked KD greatly for my small business so far. When I have to pay a contractor quickly I can do that in a few seconds. So far so good. Used it a hand full of times
Difficult to fix if account issues Works great if things flow smoothly, but I‚Äôve had an account locked and they only resolve this via email. It has taken days with still no resolution.

Garbage Complete garbage. I‚Äôm prone to losing my card and am always ordering new ones. As a result of me constantly changing cards, I‚Äôm not allowed to add a new one on Venmo.  Understandable. I figured let me get a Venmo card and everything will be copasetic. I was WRONG. The first time I used the card for food my transaction was blocked and upon calling customer service I was told that it‚Äôs a automated system and it‚Äôs nothing they could do about. I downloaded Venmo for convenience and it‚Äôs anything but that
Poor security They don‚Äôt help even if you don‚Äôt receive money they won‚Äôt give it to you!  Someone was able to change my pin and use card when I had it disabled

Love it! This is one of the most amazing money moving apps out there. Whether I‚Äôm paying a bill or my daughter needs me to transfer money to her debit card, it‚Äôs done in less than a minute. I have no complaints.

Dump the the social stuff A great app that even I can navigate around. And customer service is Second NONE  It does what it says it does and then some. Only one thing that makes zero sense to me. That is The social connections Why would you want anyone knowing your Business? I sure don‚Äôt !

author_name: not as private as i want
review_body: Nice app I like this app as it lets me pay my family that are long distance.  I like that you can set it as private but I do not like that it seems to be public for anyone to see.  I only want the person on the receiving end to see and I don‚Äôt want to see other ppls business.

Friction I‚Äôm trying to be part of Venmo, for whatever reason I‚Äôm being asked to jump through hoops which I don‚Äôt necessarily appreciate. I appreciate them being thorough gives me the impression that they‚Äôre being thorough yet remains to be seen

Bad customer service and improper procedures for errors I notified Venmo after I sent $300 to my Nephew to his mobile only to realize the person who had his  number before him still had it registered to a Venmo account. I immediately contacted Venmo within minutes of the transition.

Works well now. After a rough start with several users errors I‚Äôve learned how to use the app. It‚Äôs actually very easy, even for those who are not computer literate , to use. I receive and send money regularly.

Why I have been a Venmo customer for a while now, and I have never had any problems, until now constant, my Venmo card I use it tO get hotels it‚Äôs the only one I trust really. But I can‚Äôt even purchase anything even with money in it . What  gives I wish you guys  would make up your minds. I would like to remain a customer  but it‚Äôs embarrassing   When I went to buy something and it declined it has . Just wish you would just fix the issue

Venmo Card The Venmo Card is the right product to complete the use and management of my Venmo account...it‚Äôs a debt card that allows the use of your Venmo balances in all different manners of of transactions! It‚Äôs great....it give flexibility and and ease of use across the board!
Choice Yes!!!!!!! This!!!

Great App I love using Venmo. It‚Äôs extremely convenient. Sometimes is gives me a false error notice when trying to pay people ‚Äúyour weekly limit has been reached‚Äù. Usually when I try a few hours later, or the next day it works.  Other than that it‚Äôs a great app.

Highly upset I‚Äôve tried to give them the multiple chances but I‚Äôve had it. Everytime i turn around i either can‚Äôt transfer my funds or i can‚Äôt use my card at all. I have to starve because my account is on hold and the money on there i need and can‚Äôt retrieve it. Closing my account the minute i contact support tomorrow

Ease of use makes it a breeze. I had tried another similar app and had nothing but delays and complications. A friend suggested Venmo. Downloaded the app and made a successful transfer within minutes. Highly recommended.

Great app This app is great. I have family that lives out of state and it is so easy for us to transfer money to each other. I definitely recommend this app. It‚Äôs easy to use and easy to navigate through.
Glitch with Request/Pay I love this app - but there is a glitch where if you request/pay someone you have to click ‚Äúcancel‚Äù before you see the ‚Äúrequest/pay‚Äù buttons!

Extremely bad experiences time and time again. I hate Venmo. They are always making it so I‚Äôm not able to do an instant transfer. This app was made so you‚Äôre able to send and receive money instantly. They‚Äôre constantly telling me when I call the customer service line that they flagged me for some security reason when I‚Äôm just getting money for selling clothes. This is getting really annoying and super inconvenient. I‚Äôm staying away from Venmo.

Awesome app!! This app really is great!  Let‚Äôs me transfer $$ back and forth to my daughter, without a fee that‚Äôs going to ‚Äúbreak my bank account ‚Äú. Highly recommend, especially if you don‚Äôt live close to each other.

Simple and fast! Perfect way to transfer money between friends, family, or for business. The app is user-friendly, appears to be secure, and affordable if you need access to the transferred funds quickly.

Issues with declined payments I make the same payment every month to the same individual and half the time it is declined. When I reached out to the Venmo team I got a less than satisfactory response with no resolution.

Great app! Love being able to transfer money immediately to friends/family - makes it so easy and it‚Äôs safer than sending it in the mail and then I know for-sure it was received! Love the convenience!

Great but.. The app keeps losing connection to my bank. I have to keep re-entering my bank info frequently when using the app, as often as every 3rd time I use it. That makes me highly suspicious and fearful that someone is hacking into the app asking me to re-enter my bank credentials to steal them.

This is crazy!!!! Okay I‚Äôm reading the reviews and I see that I‚Äôm not the only person with the problem that I‚Äôm having, which is ridiculous. So I literally have 140 in my account and it‚Äôs not allowing me to transfer it to my card and to be a cash app company to kinda out rages but I‚Äôll chatting with someone that works with them and it wasn‚Äôt much help I just would like for the money to be transfer never had a problem with any other company

Great service! I just had them clean out my side yard and their service was fantastic! They were available within the week, had two people to do the job and it o my took about an hour. I couldn‚Äôt be happier!

Impossible to use I tried at least 5 different times entering my debit card to have my balance sent. The information was correct but it repeatedly declined the info, saying it was incorrect. So extremely frustrating!!! Plus having to wait 1-3 days for the money to go in, since I couldn‚Äôt get it through my debit card, is just stupid!!! Zelle is instant with no fees to get it right away. I should‚Äôve known better than to use this useless app.

Amazingly convenient, but stop trying to be a social media platform It is so convenient and makes going out and splitting bills so much easier, but please stop trying to be a social media platform. I don‚Äôt care who else paid who and I don‚Äôt need to like anyone‚Äôs payment.

Not user friendly I‚Äôve had trouble with their automatic verification of bank account info. On the 2 bank accounts I have with 2 different banks, it didn‚Äôt work after several attempts. I also had trouble paying someone AFTER the account was verified.

Amazing app! Convenient This app is AMAZING and so convenient!!! I truly love how simple makes life, among friends, pay services or rent THIS IS AWESOME, the only thing I would strongly suggest is to set up automatic monthly payments to a specific user, that would make this app PERFECT so payments can be done without you needing to transfer them every month.

Using one card on two phones It would be much easier to be able to use the same card on two phones. I have a work and personal phone and had to add another debit card.  Other than that love the service.
Absolutely LOVE Venmo!!!! I've been using Venmo for few years now,,,ABSOLUTELY üòç love it!

Great App Been using Venmo almost since it‚Äôs inception and I love it! Very convenient and easy to use. I would like an update where you can have more than one account using the same bank account tho. This would be a great update!!

Was skeptical at first....BUT not anymore I love this app. Been using it since fall 2018 and it‚Äôs now April 2019. Keeps your money secure and I got the pink Venmo debit card in the mail today! Super cute! I like that you can make your transactions private and leave some public too.:)
Makes life easier!! With our family being spread all over this definitely makes getting money to them quicker and easier!

So Helpful I‚Äôm a collegiate tutor and all of my clients pay through Venmo. I‚Äôm also just a student... and so it‚Äôs wonderful to have a way to pay my friends, get money back, etc. any time I need to. I always recommend Venmo. Reliable, easy, and convenient.

Works I love google pay send but a lot of my friends use Venmo so I have this one as well now. Works just fine. Pretty efficient and good app setup overall. I just wish it didn‚Äôt take 3 days everytime I wanted to transfer money from my bank account to my balance in the app.

Waste of time and money I‚Äôve had $2k tied up in this app for over 2 weeks. Couldn‚Äôt get it to transfer to my bank account, so it automatically transferred back to the sender (my mother, thank God). Unfortunately, she is having the same issue of the money not transferring to her bank account and is also jumping through the loops to even retrieve the money back. This app MIGHT be sufficient for petty cash, but if you‚Äôre needing the money in a timely manner don‚Äôt waste your time here.
Easy peasy! Easy method to pay and receive payments. We now need a debit card that links up with our balance so we don‚Äôt have to transfer funds to bank account. Less steps and more security...
Excellent I get a fast service it transfers the money in less than what it tells you it will take. Usually says it will take up to 30 minutes for you to get the money transferred into your account.

Complete garbage I never leave reviews, but I will never use Venmo again. Zelle all the way since they actually transfer immediately without problems. You have seriously ruined a huge opportunity for me.

Not for all Most people like choices as if they are selecting from a menu. Once I find something I like, especially in an app, I‚Äôll stick with it. No frills. Venmo charges a fee if  I send $ because I won‚Äôt link my bank account to Venmo. Rather than wait for  Venmo to mess up (it‚Äôs a little late for that now) I strongly prefer vendors who have proven themselves for security and performance. Even more important, I won‚Äôt pay fees for a service when others don‚Äôt charge them. No thanks Venmo.

Too difficult So far - it‚Äôs too difficult to even sign up and verify my bank account .  This is really confusing .  They deposited into my bank account the same ‚Äòtest‚Äô amount and when I tried to verify it - I got the message that my account is invalid uuuggghhh !!!

Loses connection to my bank Every couple of weeks venmo loses connection to my bank. I have to delete my bank, and add it again. It‚Äôs a huge pain, and not very convenient. There are many ways to transfer money to people instantly now, Venmo needs to fix this, or be replaced.

Amazing! Venmo is so easy and fun. I recommend this app to everyone. It‚Äôs secure and keeps your banking info private. They‚Äôve also added a card that you can customize and use instead of your direct bank card. Keep up the good work Venmo.

Easy exchange I love Venmo it is so easy to exchange money back-and-forth between friends and clients. It is safe & incredibly convenient to use. No longer do I need chips from the bank or credit card machines. I highly recommend this app.

Great way to avoid writing checks I‚Äôm new to Venmo, just started using it 2-3 months ago and it‚Äôs a super easy way to quickly receive and send money. The ways of writing checks and mailing are getting way less these days.

Somewhat useless This app is a inconvenient version of square cash. I only have it because I can‚Äôt convince all of my friends to get square. Why can‚Äôt there be an option to instantly cash out. This is a nightmare on road trips you have to wait so long to get your money back when you need it then. The look of the app is confusing so many tabs and features to do something simple.
Horrible support For some reason, one of my payments was deemed suspicious and they locked my account. Good luck sorting it out.

Services a purpose Well I‚Äôve had the Venmo App for a couple years now and have always liked it.  It is not difficult to navigate and use and it can be a very helpful way to get money to anyone, anywhere, anytime.

Nice app... But pretty confusing Being able to switch between sources of payment needs to be better streamlined. I accidentally paid from a source that I didn‚Äôt want to use and now my finances are all screwed up. Please simplify this process for those of us who get confused easily. üòì

Social media? No thanks. As a Square Cash user, I had no idea this app had a social media-like feature where all of your transactions are set to automatically publish to all of your connected contacts. Even though you can turn this off, it defaults to making all of your transactions public. The last thing I need is to see when people spend money and another place for people to comment, message, like. Etc. Back to Square, thanks.

Hold money without notice Beware, Venmo will hold money for review without notice. So, for example, if a roommate sends you $800 to use for rent, Venmo may hold this amount and not allow you to transfer to your bank without giving you any notice. So don‚Äôt use Venmo if you need the money fast. Also, they don‚Äôt even explain why a transfer won‚Äôt go through it just says it‚Äôs not working instead of explaining what is going on with the hold. Sooo annoying and huge inconvenience.

Awful Idea Instead of a customer service oriented company that would communicate with you if there was a problem , Venmo( ie PayPal ) has kept my money and the person trying to pay me tied up for the better part of a week .

Easy and necessary From babysitting, piano lessons, and Classroom donations to group trips and paying my neighbor back for a grocery pickup this easy to pay everyone instantly is essential!  I also love that you can send a charge to someone who owes you money.

Wonderful! Extremely useful and safe. I use this all the time now! The only thing that could be better would be if there was a built-in calculator in the app so you could figure out how to split expenses with multiple people.

Using Funds in Account Venmo doesn‚Äôt use funds from your Venmo account unless there‚Äôs enough to fully cover a transaction. Why? Is it that hard to split a payment? Take what‚Äôs in my Venmo account and the rest from my bank account.üòí
Simplicity Money has never been easier to transfer or request from those around you. The ‚ÄúI will pay you back‚Äù people now will definitely have to reimburse you.

It‚Äôs All Good You know what there ain‚Äôt nothing bad with this service. It‚Äôs fast reliable and quick. No mess and no hassle. I honestly recommend for people for go out together and are trying to split the bill. It‚Äôs definitely worth it.

Convenient but incomplete Convenient to send money and link with other apps to pay for goods/ services. You can see purchases in the app but there is no option to see ALL transactions. For example, I returned an item to a merchant but I can‚Äôt tell if I‚Äôve been refunded or not. Very confusing ...

Need folders Great app. Easy to use for any money swap. But the only downfall is it needs a place to separate your funds that are in the "venmo bank account". Like the ability to have a Fantasy Football folder to keep payments in, versus a folder where people from work pay me.

Express pay You guys should implement an express pay option. Where you guys give the option to do an express pay of same day transfers; like with in hours of the transaction but charge 50 cents for it. While also still having the regular option of waiting 1-3 business days for the cheap people.

Easy money. Easy to use, great that it keeps the money you get Venmo‚Äôd in the account on your app. Only downfall that is does have, clearly not a big deal, is that it makes you put a comment or else you can‚Äôt complete the transaction.

Terrible Venmo drafts money out of your account at random and without permission... before I had the opportunity to use the services on the app, I received notice from my bank stating that Venmo had withdrawn money out of my account. Do not use this app.

No instant transfers, money charged not deivered The instant transfer feature charges the credit card a 3% transaction fee with a promise of funds delivered same day. It has been 3 days and the person I paid via Instant transfer has no sign of the money. Venmo has told us it is in a clearing house and will take yet another 1.5 days to transfer to the recipient. My credit card was charged instantly with the additional 3% fee and the money should be delivered by now. This is a scam.

Wow Venmo is the go to resource I use for transferring money to my friends. I think it‚Äôs so cool that they now allow immediate deposit, especially since I don‚Äôt mind giving a mere $0.25 each time for that. Honestly 100% worth it, shouts out Venmo for being such homies. Lemme work for you

What a terrible app!! Just kidding. Stupid how user friendly this app is. It works amazing as long as you have a real bank but works with almost any! If you are having issues with the app customer is great!!! Tech chat is an amazing resource!!! Awesome!!!

Better than PayPal I‚Äôve never had an issue with Venmo and would like to see it become the new PayPal. It‚Äôs quick, easy to use, and I‚Äôve never had a problem like with PayPal getting kicked off. A++ in my book!

DO NOT USE! This app is ridiculous. author_name: Leash Lady of El Dorado Hills
review_body: Quick and easy As long as its debit to debit there are no fees.

Works perfectly I have literally had zero issues/problems with this app since I installed it. It makes paying for things like lawn care and scout activities so much easier.

Easy to use! We pay our rent through Venmo! Just yesterday was purchasing something on fb and couldn‚Äôt get PayPal to work after 3 tries we gave up. Then used Venmo which worked on the first try! Super easy to use!

I‚Äôll never use this app again and trust me you shouldn‚Äôt either. They locked mine and two of my cousins accounts and the same thing happened to them.

Love this app! You could say that I ªm ‚ÄúOld School‚Äù so trying out an app that can pay people directly or assist in receiving reimbursement seems daunting, even scary! Venmo is super easy to use, convenient, I wonder why it took me so long to embrace this new technology?!!!

Worst customer service EVER I accidentally Venmoed the wrong person and Venmo told me to contact him to get the money back. Venmoed emailed me and told me because Bank of America stopped the payment (that never posted) I owe them $78. Then they said if I don‚Äôt pay they will freeze my account. Are you kidding me?? Annoying Constantly losing connection to my bank. Every month I pay rent it says ‚Äúlost connection to bank‚Äù so I have to remove my bank and add it again. This has happened probably 5 or 6 times. Venmo review. Exchanging funds for personal or business purposes through Venmo is simple, convenient and expedient. Is there a way to transfer a specific value from Venmo to other accounts? If this step is available or simplified this app definitely has potential to earn 5 stars.

GOOGLE WALLET IS THE BEST HANDS DOWN.

I love Venmo Super easy way to pay people. No need for transactions just a quick tap into Venmo and you can send anyone any amount of money you want. The money is transferred into your account pretty fast after you request it.

Insecure garbage. Deleted and disconnected. I had Venmo for about a year and all seemed fine. Just another electronic funds transfer method really. But when I recently got 8 different random request from skanky young teenage girls asking for $5 and to text them for a surprise, I had serious concerns for the privacy and security of the app. Needless to say, it‚Äôs now deleted and the account is closed. Venmo lost another customer and money since they can‚Äôt control these spammers.

author_name: ugh, why do I need a nickname?
review_body: Easy to pay I find Venmo easy to use to make payments. However, I feel ‚Äúprivate‚Äù should be the default. I don‚Äôt understand why paying someone or splitting a bill is ever a social media event that you would want shared with strangers, or even friends.

Venmo is unprofessional I had been using Venmo for almost 2 year till suddenly it stopped work for me. With minimal use I thought nothing of it. Little did I know Venmo had disabled my account without any reason quoting ‚Äúour decision making process is confidential‚Äù My only activity was with friends and family. They stopped responding to my email and it took legal action to get my remaining balance from my account. Don‚Äôt trust them with your money!

The worst fintech app ever used. Period! Not sure they did software QA or not.  If they did, they did fairly poor job.  Can‚Äôt add credit cards to multiple accounts.  With credit score over 800, I never had any problem with CCs, except Venmo. It keeps promoting ‚ÄúError, can‚Äôt use this CC, use anther CC‚Äù.  What a cheap error msg! Didn‚Äôt say what the error was, and fit it on Venmo side, but ask customers to work around the bug. Can‚Äôt believe it has such a high rating.

If I could give zero stars I would. Apparently new users get security flagged. I wasn‚Äôt able to add my debit card I so contacted customer support and I‚Äôm told that I‚Äôve been flagged and I have to wait a while. So I wait a couple days and I still can‚Äôt add my debit card. So I try to add my bank account and I still can‚Äôt. Well now what? I contact customer support again and I‚Äôm told I‚Äôm not allowed to know why I‚Äôve been flagged or what I can do to free my account.

Why is the default seeing payments of others? I love the easy way to pay people. I hate seeing lots of other user‚Äôs activity. I wish I had a choice for the default so I could see my own transactions and if my students have paid  me. I wish searching for a transaction were easier
Missing Money Hi,

I wouldn‚Äôt had to call to cancel a card that I didn‚Äôt open if you would have asked for an ID to begin with. Venmo is a scam and would never use this app.

a MUST have this user friendly app is the easiest and most convenient way to send money. there‚Äôs no fee to send or recurve money with a linked bank account! I‚Äôve never been disappointed with Venmo!

Way better than PayPal I love this app.  So frickin easy to use even for a luddite.   Way easier and quicker than PayPal which I hate.   So many friends have this it‚Äôs great to pay for lunch that someone went out to get t work.

Wow! Wonderful Transfer of $ Easy! Fast! Efficient! My 3 older children shared this tool with me - have used multiple times with no glitches. This older mom has shared it with

GOING BACK TO ZELLE

author_name: D o n a l d
review_body: Too many unsolicited requests I just closed my account today after years of use. It is all over the Internet, too many unsolicited payment requests from strangers, even with having all history and settings set to private. There is a video going round suggesting how people do this. Until Venmo stops this, there are too many other payment alternatives; I'll not be back.

The fall of my favorite social media platform. Venmo used to offer endless content in the Public tab, I could scroll for hours looking at those sweet public money transactions, liking and commenting, but now it‚Äôs restricted to only loading a few posts. What happened? Where did Venmo go wrong? I guess the money sharing part works fine.

Quick, convenient, MEGA time saver, what‚Äôs not to love?? Quick, convenient, MEGA time saver, what‚Äôs not to love??  Wish they used Applepay for security reasons though, that would make it 100% perfect.  Still one of my favorite apps!!!

Makes Doing Business a Cinch! As a real estate agent I often have to pay for things on behalf of my clients.  Venmo makes it easy for them to pay me back. It‚Äôs also a snap to pay my lash, hair and nail ladies!

If they had zero star I would have given them that Their system is completely flawed. They shouldn‚Äôt only be able to take money out of your account and then not be able to refund your money back. Also the system where the money debited reflects days after totally harms ones bank record and sends your account into overdraft.  I do not recommend.

The Best! I love Venmo they do not charge near as much as PayPal to get your own money, the app is super user friendly, and the Venmo card makes it easy to have access to your funds immediately free of charge!

. Venmo is great but I wish the money transferred from person to person was instantly there instead of waiting a few days. I just use cashapp usually unless the other person doesn‚Äôt have it.
